title: 127 - Mulungu Asamalabe
markdown:
### 127 - Mulungu Asamalabe   
HE LOVES ME, TOO    

  **1.**   
 Mulungu asamalabe Mbalame zonsezo;   
 Ngatitu azikondadi, Akonda inenso. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Andiknda, andikonda, Akonda inenso;   
 Akonda zinthu zonsezo, Akonda inenso.   

  **2.**   
 Maluwa mthengo monsemo Apanga Mbuyeyo;   
 Ngatitu awakondadi, Akonda inenso.   

  **3.**   
 Mulungu, mlengi wathuyo Apanga zonsezo;   
 Samaiwala ana ’ce, Aknda onsewo.

title: 128 - Nthawi Ya Pemphero
markdown:
### 128 - Nthawi Ya Pemphero    
BLESSED HOUR OF PRAYER   

  **1.**   
 Nthawi ya pempheroyo, powerama ife,   
 Tisonkhana kwa Yesu, Ambuyathuyo;   
 Tikakhulupiratu adzatibisanso,   
 Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ndi yokomadi, nthawi ya pempho,   
 Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu   

  **2.**   
 Nthawi ya pempheroyo, Yesu ali mfupi   
 Ndi cifundo caceco atimvera ’fe.   
 Atiuza nkhawazo, tizataye kwa ’Ye,   
 Tidzapeza mpumulo, tikapempheratu.   

  **3.**   
 Nthawi ya pempheroyo, akuyesedwawo   
 Amatula kwa Yesu zisoni zawo;   
 Yesu wacifundoyo amazicotsatu,   
 Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu.   

  **4.**   
 Nthawi ya pempheroyo tikhulupiranso   
 Kuti zomwe tisowa tilandiradi;   
 Tikakhulupiradi nkhawa zicokanso;   
 Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu

title: 129 - Yesu Mnalonjeza
130 - Ndine Wanuyo
markdown:
### 130 - Ndine Wanuyo    
I AM THINE, O LORD   

  **1.**   
 Ndine wanuyo, ndamva mauwo, A cikondi canuco;   
 Mundikoketu mfupi ndinuyo, Mwa cikhulupiroco. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Mndisendeze (mfupi), mfupi mbuyanga, Ndi pa mtanda wanuwo;   
 Mndisendeze mfupi, Mbuye wanga ’Nu, Ndi pa mwazi wanuwo.   

  **2.**   
 M’nchito yanu mndipatulire ’ne, Mwa cisomo canuco;   
 Moyo wangawo uyang’ane ’Nu, Ndicitetu zanuzo.   

  **3.**   
 Ndikondwera ’ne pakupitatu, Kugwadira Mbuyeyo;   
 Pakunenenatu naye mtserimo, Monga bwenzi langalo.   

  **4.**   
 Sindidziwatu za cikondico, Mpaka n’dzanke tsidyalo;   
 Sindifikira za cimwemweco, Mpaka n’dzanke kwanuko.

title: 131 - Inetu Ndifunadi
markdown:
### 131 - Inetu Ndifunadi   
   

  **1.**   
 Inetu ndifunadi Kufanana ndi Yesu,   
 Andidzaze mtimamo Ndi kufatsa kwaceko;   
 Ndidziyenda monga ’Ye mdziko la zoipali;   
 Ndine wosaukadi, Yesu mkhale mtimanga.   

  **2.**   
 Ngati amva kwangwala, Nayang’ana mphetazo,   
 Nasamala zonsezo, Ndithu andimveranso   
 Adzandiphunzitsa ’ne, Nakhulukira ’ne;   
 Ndikhaletu wagwiro, Yesu mkhale mtimanga.   

  **3.**   
 Popemphera ndikhale Monga Yesu Mbuyeyo;   
 Ndipumule mwa Iye, Andimwetse madziwo.

title: 132 - Yesu, Mundisungetu
markdown:
### 132 - Yesu, Mundisungetu    
NEAR THE CROSS   

  **1.**   
 Yesu, mundisungetu, Mfupi mtanda wina    
 Ndipezemo kasupe wondiciza Mtima. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Mtandawo, mtandawo, Nditamanda mtanda,   
 Mpaka moyo wangawo Udzapume mmwamba.   

  **2.**   
 Nsisi zandipezanso, Pomwe pali mtanda.   
 Ee! Pa mtanda nthandayo Indiunikira.   

  **3.**   
 Pa mtandapo ndiona Mwana wa Mulungu.   
 Mndithandize, Mbuyanga, Kuyendabe nanu.   

  **4.**   
 Pa mtandapo ndzalinda, Ndikuyembekeza,   
 Mpaka ndidzfika ku Dziko la kumwamba.

title: 133 - Ndiyende Nanu Mulungu
134 - Ndi Mtima Wanga Wonse
markdown:
### 134 - Ndi Mtima Wanga Wonse    
WONDERFUL LOVE OF JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Ndi Mtima wanga wonsewo, Ndikweza mau kwanuko,   
 Ndiyimbe bwanji cikondi Cozizwitsa ca Yesu Mbuye? 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Cikonditu cozizwaco, Cikondi ca Yesuyo;   
 Cikonditu cozizwaco, Cikondi ca Yesuyo.   

  **2.**   
 Cipatsa ’ne mtenderewo, Ciunikira m’njirayo,   
 Cicotsa bvuto Cozizwitsa ca Yesu Mbuye.   

  **3.**   
 Ciyembekezo cangaco Conditurutsa m’macimo;   
 Pakufa ndi’imba cikondi Cozizwitsa ca Yesu Mbuye.

title: 135 - Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga
markdown:
### 135 - Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga    
I LOVE THEE BETTER, LORD   

  **1.**   
 Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga, Koposa zonsezo;   
 Cifukwa mwandipatsatu Mtendere wanuwo 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Sanazinene zonsezo (zonsezo), Za nsisi zacezo;   
 Sanazinene zonsezo (zonsezo) Watsuka inenso.   

  **2.**   
 Mukhala mfupi ndineyo, Koposa onsewo;   
 Ndikonda kuganiza ’Nu Koposa zinazo.   

  **3.**   
 Mwandikondwetsa, Mbuyanga, Ndisangalaladi;   
 Popanda nsisi zanuzo Sindingakondwei.   

  **4.**   
 Ambuye wanga, Yesuyo, Mkayenda nanedi,   
 Masiku onse pansipo Ndidzakondweradi.

title: 136 - Akan’stogoza Ndinkako
markdown:
### 136 - Akan’stogoza Ndinkako    
I REMEMBER CALVARY   

  **1.**   
 Akan’stogoza ndinkako, Ndikulupira Mbuyeyo;   
 Ndikumbukira kutitu Anandifera pa mtanda. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Yesu anditsogozatu Ulendo wanga wonsewo.   
 Bwenzi loona ndiyeyo Ndkumbukira Mtandawo   

  **2.**   
 Ndinkonda mau acewo, Anditsogoze Mbuyeyo;   
 Kufuna kwace ndicite, Anandifera pa mtanda.   

  **3.**   
 Ndzapita osaopai, Akhale nane Yesuyo.   
 Pa tsiku lina n’dzaona Yesu tsamwali wa mtanda.

title: 137 - Dziko Ai, Koma Yesu
markdown:
### 137 - Dziko Ai, Koma Yesu    
GIVE ME JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Dziko ai, Koma Yesu, Dziko ndi lacabetu;   
 Nsisi zace zikhalitsa Nthawi zonse yemweyo. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Nsisi zace n’zazikuru, Ndi cikondi cacenso;   
 Ciombolo cozizwitsa, Moyotu wosathawo!   

  **2.**   
 Dziko ai, koma Yesu, Wondisangalatsa ’ne;   
 Iye andiyang’anira, Nkana m’bvuto ndi’mbabe.   

  **3.**   
 Dziko ai, Koma Yesu, Ndiyang’ane Iyeyo;   
 Pa ulendo wanga wonse, Andiunikira ’ne.   

  **4.**   
 Dziko ai, Koma Yesu, Mtandawo ndigwiradi;   
 Mpakatu maso ndi maso, Ndidzamone Mbuyeyo.

title: 138 - Ndipereka Moyowu
markdown:
### 138 - Ndipereka Moyowu    
ENTIRE CONSECRATION   

  **1.**   
 Ndipereka moyowu Kwa Ambuye wanga ’Nu;   
 Manjawa acitetu Cifuniro canuco. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Munditsuke ine Mtima mbu (e, Ine mbu)   
 M’mwazi wa Ambuye Yesuyo (E, Yesuyo),   
 Kwanu Mbuyanga ndiziperekadi,   
 Kwanu nthawi zonsezo.   

  **2.**   
 Ndipereka myendoyi, Ikhaletu yanuyo;   
 Mau ayimbirenso Inu Mfumu yangayo.   

  **3.**   
 Ndipereka milomo, Inetu mauwo;   
 Ndipereka cumaco, Sindimana kanthui.   

  **4.**   
 ndipereka nsikuzo, Kuti ndiyamike ’Nu;   
 Ndipereka nzeruzo Kucitatu ntchitoyo.   

  **5.**   
 Cifuniro cangaco Cikhaletu canunso;   
 Ndipereka mtimanga, Ukhaletu wanunso.   

  **6.**   
 Ndipereka cikondi Pa mapazi anuwo;   
 Munditenge ndensene, Ndikhaletu wanuyo.

title: 139 - Tsamwali Ndamkumanayo
markdown:
### 139 - Tsamwali Ndamkumanayo    
I’VE FOUND A FRIEND   

  **1.**   
 Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Anandikonda kale;   
 Kukonda kwandigwirako, M’kukondamo nditsale.   
 Ku Mtima kundimangako, Kosamasuka konse,   
 Ambuye ndine wanuyo, Ku nthawi nthawi zonse.   

  **2.**   
 Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Anandifera yekha;   
 Anadipatsa moyowao, Ndatenga ine ndekha;   
 Zimene ndiri nazozi, Za Yesu, mwini zonse   
 Ndi moyo wanga wonse ndi Wacenso nthawi zonse.   

  **3.**   
 Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Ndapeza mphamvu zanga,   
 Pakundisunga inemo, Ndiyende m’njira mwanga;   
 Zolemera zoti mbe Zilimbitsa monse,   
 Ndalema kuno komweko, Nkupuma nthawi zonse.   

  **4.**   
 Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Wokoma Mtima wace,   
 Wotsogolera nzeruzo, Zisunga m’njira mwace;   
 Kwa Iye wondikondako, Sandicotsamo konse,   
 Pa moyo, imfa, nayeyo, Ndiripo nthawi zonse.

title: 140 - Mau A Yesu
markdown:
### 140 - Mau A Yesu    
THE VOICE OF JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Idza udzapume   
 Wolema’we ndi zoipa, Tsamira pa Ine.   
 Ndinadza kwa Yesu momwe ndinali  wolema;   
 Mwa iye ndinapumula, Nandikondweretsa.   

  **2.**   
 Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Ndipatsa kolere   
 Madzi a moyo wosatha, Idza udzamwetu   
 Ndinadza kwa Yesu ndi ’mwa Mu mtsinje wamoyo   
 Ndipo ndinatsitsimuka, Ndikhala mwa Iye.   

  **3.**   
 Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Ndine kuunika;   
 Yang’ananitsa kwa ine, Ndipo udzakondwa.   
 Ndinayang’ana kwa Yesu, Mwa Iye ndiwala;   
 Ndidzayendabe m’ku’nika, Mpaka kumwambako.

title: 141 - Ndikhaletu Wanu
markdown:
### 141 - Ndikhaletu Wanu    
WHOLLY THINE   

  **1.**   
 Ndikhaletu wanu, Mbuyanga; Konseko, konseko,   
 E! kufuna ndicite, Mndithandizetu. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Wanutu (Mbuye), wanutu (Mbuye), Ndine wanu, Mbuyana   
 Wanutu (Mbuye), wanutu (Mbuye), Ndine wanu leroli   

  **2.**   
 Cuma ninji ko popanda Inuyo, Mbuyanga,   
 Ndidzasiya zinthu zonsezo, Ndidzatsata ’Nu.   

  **3.**   
 Pofulatire ’ne dzikoli, Mkhaletu nanenso;   
 Inu ndinu Cuma cangacho; Mnditonthozetu.

title: 142 - Tsiku Lokoma Leroli
markdown:
### 142 - Tsiku Lokoma Leroli   
HOW SWEET!   

  **1.**   
 Tsiku lokoma leroli, Loposa enawao;   
 La kuguniza zinathu za Mulungu wathuyo.   

  **2.**   
 Inde, kukoma kumvatu Za mau acewo,   
 Otembenuza mtimawo Kuloza mmwambamo.   

  **3.**   
 Ngati sititha chimolo, Kusiya tokha ’fe    
 Ambuye wathu, Yesuyo, Adzaticotsatu.

title: 143 - Mbuye Mtipititse
markdown:
### 143 - Mbuye Mtipititse    
LORD, DISMISS US   

  **1.**   
 Mbuye, mtipititse tonse, Ndi dalitso lanulo;   
 Mwa cikondi canu, Mbuye, Mutipatse nsisizo.   
 Mutitsitsimutse ife Pakuyenda m’dzikoli.   

  **2.**   
 Tiyamika Inu, Mbuye, Kamba ka uthengawu;   
 Mphatso za cipulumutso Zidzazetu mtimawu   
 Kuti ife tikhalebe Okhulupirikawo   

  **3.**   
 Nsiku zathu zonse, Mbuye, Tipereka kwanuko;   
 Mutilimbikitse, Mbuye, Kuti tisatopei   
 Mpaka tidzaone tonse, Ulemerero wanu.

title: 144 - Ndipitabe Mtsogolomo
markdown:
### 144 - Ndipitabe Mtsogolomo    
HIGHER GROUND   

  **1.**   
 Ndiitabe mtsogolomo, Ndikwera nthawi zonsezo;   
 Ndipempha Inu, Mbuyanga, Mndikweze ’ne Pamwambapo. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Mndikwezetu ’ne, Pamwamba nsika zonsezo;   
 Pamene sin’nafikepo, Mdikweze ’ne pamwambapo.   

  **2.**   
 Sin’funatu kukhalabe Kumene kuli nkhawazo;   
 Ngakhale ena ’khaleko, Mdikweze ’ne pamwambapo.   

  **3.**   
 Ndikhalebe pamwambapol, Ngakhale ndiyesedwa ’ne;   
 Ndikhulupira kutitu, Mndikweza ’ne pamwambapo.

title: 145 - Msakane Nchito Ya Mulungu
markdown:
### 145 - Msakane Nchito Ya Mulungu    
ASK NOT TO BE EXCUSED   

  **1.**   
 Msakane ntchito ya Mulungu wanuyo, Mupite komweko afuna Iyeyo.   
 Anaitana ’nu, Amaitanabe, Mudzakondweradi Pogwira ntchitoyo.    

  **CHORUS:**   
 Bwerani, Msakane ntchitoyo, Bwerani, Kwa Mluungu wanuyo   
 Msakane ntchito ya Mulungu wanuyo, Mupite komweko Afuna Iyeyo.   

  **2.**   
 Msakane ntchitoyo, Imvani leroli; Mwakana kalelo, Musakanenso bi!   
 Zotuta nzambiri, acepa ’nchitowo, Mukondekondetu Kukopa anthuwo   

  **3.**   
 Msakane ntchitoyo, Msacedwenso; Pakukanidwabe Cikondi cicoka    
 Pamene Mzimuyo Aloza njirayo, Popempa Yesuyo, Idzani leroli.

title: 146 - Mukhale M’mtima Mwanga
markdown:
### 146 - Mukhale M’mtima Mwanga    
THY LIFE WITHIN ME   

  **1.**   
 Mukhale m’mtima mwanga Ee, Yesu, Mfumuyo   
 Mudniyankhire ine mafunso angawo   
 Mukhale m’mtima mwanga, Mditsogoleretu,   
 Kuti ndionetsere Ukuru wanuwo.   

  **2.**   
 Kacisi wa mtimanga Wayeretsedwatu,   
 Ulemerero wanu Uwale mkatimo;   
 Ndi thupi langa lonse Likhale lanulo,   
 Licite nthawi zonse Kufuna kwanuko   

  **3.**   
 Ziwalo zanga zonse, Mzilamuliretu,   
 Mucite nazo zonse Kufuna kwanuko;   
 Ndizipereke ndense, osang’ungudzanso,   
 Polamulidwa nanu Mu ntchito zangazo.  

  **4.**   
 Ndidzapumula ndithu Mu Mtima mwangamo,   
 Ndidzalindira Inu, Mukandifunatu;   
 Mukhale m’mtima mwanga, Ee, Yesu, Mfumuyo,   
 Mundiyankhire ine, Mafunso angawo.

title: 147 - Tate Mundisendeze Mfupi
markdown:
### 147 - Tate Mundisendeze Mfupi   
DRAW ME CLOSER TO THEE   

  **1.**   
 Tate mundisendeze mfupi, Ndifuna Inuyo;   
 Mundiyangate mmanja mwanu, Ndipume mwanumo. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Zingwe za cikondico, Mfupi, Zikokere ’ne;   
 Mfupi, mfupi, Ndinu m’mwambamo.   

  **2.**   
 Yesu Mundisendeze mfupi, Ndisasiye inu;   
 Dzanja lanu linditsogoze, Ndisasocerei.   

  **3.**   
 Mzimu mundisendeze mfupi, Ndifanane ndinuyo;   
 Mtima mwangamo munditsuke, Ndiyere ine mbu!

title: 148 - Ponse Ponse Naye Yesu
markdown:
### 148 - Ponse Ponse Naye Yesu    
ANYWHERE WITH JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Ponse ponse naye Yesu ndzapita, Ponse ponse anditsogolera ’ne   
. Pakapanda Iye sindikondwai, Ponse ponse naye sindiopatu. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ponsepo, Ponsepo, Sindiopai, Ponse ponse nay endidzapitapo   

  **2.**   
 Ponse ponse Yesu ali ndi ine, Nkana ena andisiye m’dzikoli.   
 Nkana njira yanga iri yoopsya, Ponse ponse ndimyamika Yesuyo.   

  **3.**   
 Ponsepo ndi Yesu ndidzagonatu, Mmene mdima undiphimba ineyo.   
 Ndziwa kuti ndidzauka tsikulo, Ponsepo ndi Yesu ndiko kwathuko.

title: 149 - Yenda Mkuunika
markdown:
### 149 - Yenda Mkuunika    
WALK IN THE LIGHT   

  **1.**   
 Yenda nk’unika Kwaceko, Atsogolere ’we;   
 Ndi Mzimu wa kumwambayo "Dzainga mdimawo. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Yendanibe, Mkuunitatu;   
 Yendanibe, Mkun’ikatu kwa Mlunguyo.    Bass and Tenor;   
 Yendanibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo   
 Yendanibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo   
 Yendabibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo;   
 Mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo   

  **2.**   
 Yenda mk’unika Yesuyo, Wowala m’mauyo   
 Atsogolera onswe, Okhulupirawo   

  **3.**   
 Nkana mithunzi igwetu, Kudetsa njirayo.   
 Mdimawo udzathawatu, Ku’nika kwaceko.   

  **4.**   
 Yenda mkk’unika kwaceko, Udziwe nsisizo   
 Cikondi cidzaposadi, Pofika Mmwambamo.

title: 150 - Okunkhawo Ali Kuti?
markdown:
### 150 - Okunkhawo Ali Kuti?   
WHERE ARE THE REAPERS?   

  **1.**   
 Okunkhawo alitu kutiko? Amene akunkhatu zabwino?   
 Kucoka mu dziko loipali, Pocita ndi mau a Mlunguyo? 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ndanitu adze kudzakunkha, Kusonkhanitsira anthu m’mwambamo?   
 Ndi yani atithandizeko, Pofunafuna zobalazo?   

  **2.**   
 Pitani mu mphambano monsemo, Funani mupezemo abwino;   
 Pitani kwa anthu ponse ponse, Musonkhanitsire kumwambako.   

  **3.**   
 Zobala zakhwima ponse ponse za m’dzikomu zilindira ife.   
 Okuntha acepa ku ntchitoyi, Zambiri zidzaonongekatu.  

  **4.**   
 Anthuni idzani ndi zidazo, Kudzasonankhanitsa za m’mundamo;   
 Gwiranibe mpaka Ambuyeyo Adzabwera ali kukondwatu.

title: 151 - Ndiganiza Za Dziko Lokometsa
markdown:
### 151 - Ndiganiza Za Dziko Lokometsa    
WILL THERE BE ANY STARS?   

  **1.**   
 Ndiganiza za dziko lokometsalo, Komwe nzafikako tsikulo;   
 Podzaima pa mbali M’lumutsiyo, Ndidzavala nyenyezizo ko? 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ndidzabvala nyenyezizo ko, Mbuyanga, Mmene dzuwa lidzalowadi (lowadi)   
 Mmene ndazuka mmalo a mpumulo, Ndidzabvala nyenyezizo ko (tsikulo)   

  **2.**   
 M’mphamvu yaceyo ndigwiretu ntchitoyo, Kuti ndikopetu anthuwo;   
 Kuti ndzapate nyenyezi pa tsikulo, Mmene Mbuye ’dzayamika ’fe.   

  **3.**   
 Ndidzakondwera poona Mbuyanga, Ndikupereka mituloyo;   
 Ndidzakondwera m’mzinda wa golidiwo, Ndikadzabvala nyenyezizo.

title: 152 - Yesu Mundilankhule
markdown:
### 152 - Yesu Mundilankhule    
SPEAK TO MY SOUL   

  **1.**   
 Yesu, Mundilankhule, Mau ofatsawo;   
 Mndinong’oneze kuti, SUlitu wekha ’we.   
 Mtima munditsegule, Kuti ndimvere ’Nu;   
 Mdzaze mu Mtima wanga, Kuti ndikondwedi. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Mundinong’onezetu, mwa nsisi zanuzo   
 Udzagonjetsa ndithu, Udzamasukadi.   
 Mundilankhule, Mbuye, Tsiku ndi tsikunso,   
 Ndimvetu mau anu, Sulita wekha ’we   

  **2.**   
 Yesu, munene mau Ndi ana anuwo,   
 Kuyang’anira Inu, Muwapjunzitsetu;   
 Kuti apereketu Moyo kwa inuyo,   
 Udze ufumu wanu, Kuti ’dzaone ’Nu.   

  **3.**   
 Kale munaonetsa Kufuna kwanuko,   
 Yanga ndidziwe ntchito, Ndicite zanuzo;   
 Ndilemekeze Inu, Kwa anthu onsewo,   
 Ncite kufuna kwanu, Masiku onsewo.

title: 153 - Sindipemphera, Mbuyanga
154 - Mlonda, Tandiuze Ine
markdown:
### 154 - Mlonda, Tandiuze Ine    
WATCHMAN, TELL ME   

  **1.**   
 Mlonda, tandiuze ine, Kunja kuli cutako?   
 Zosonyeza kudza kwace, Kodi zionekadi?   
 Inde, Mlendo, taonanil, Kuca kwayandikiratu,   
 Bvala za kukoma zako, Kuli kuca, dzuka ’we.   

  **2.**   
 Mlonda, nyali iunika Mommo m’njira mwakomo;   
 Zozizwitsa m’dziko monse, Zisonyeza tsikulo.   
 Podzaomba pa lipenga, Pakudzuka a ku manda,   
 Omwalira mwa Ambuye, Adzabvala cosafa.  

  **3.**   
 Mlonda, pfu’la liri kudza Tsiku lalikurulo.   
 Onse alalike kuti, Mfumu yayandkatu.   
 Inde, mlendo ’we, ndiona, Dziko lopambana lija.   
 Mzinda wopambana yonse, Uoneka tsidyalo.   

  **4.**   
 Mlonda, undiuze ine, Za mu mzinda momwemo,   
 Mmene Mfumu ikukhala, Pa cimpando caceco.   
 Dziko lija likuwala Ndi ulemerero wace;   
 Kuli dzuwa ndi mitengo, Ndi mitsinje yoposa.   

  **5.**   
 Dzuwa lituruka ndithu, La usana womwewo.   
 Onse alalike kuti, Tsiku layandikatu.   
 Aulendo aonenso, Kuli phiri la Mulungu;   
 Tidzafika, konko msanga, Tidzakondwererako

title: 155 - Kapenatu Si Ku Phriko
markdown:
### 155 - Kapenatu Si Ku Phriko    
I’LL GO WHERE YO WANT ME TO   

  **1.**   
 Kapenatu si ku phiriko, Kapena ku nyanjako,   
 Kapena ku nkhondo komwetu, Mufuna ndipite ’ne;   
 Komatu akandituma ’ne Ku dziko la ’lendowo,   
 Ndilola mwa mphamvu ya Mbuyeyo, Ndzapita mufunako.    

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ndzapita kulmene mufunako, M’phiri, m’dambo, ndi m’nyanja   
 Ndzanena zimene mufunazo, Ndzatsata Mpulumutsiyo   

  **2.**   
 Alipo mau Ambuyeyo, Afuna ndinetu;   
 Kapena kuli wocimwayo Wosowa thandizoli;   
 Ambuye, mkanditsogoza ’ne, Ingabvute njirayo,   
 Ndzauza uthenga wabwinowo, Ndzanena mufunazo.   

  **3.**   
 Alipo malo a inenso Ku munda wa Mbuyeyo,   
 Ndzagwira ntchito yotutayo Ya Yesu wopacikwa.   
 Pokhulupirira mwanumo, podziwa mndikonda ’ne,   
 Ndzacita kufunatu kwanuko, Ndzakhala mufunazo.

title: 156 - Mau Akukwiya Leka
markdown:
### 156 - Mau Akukwiya Leka    
ANGRY WORDS! OH, LET THEM NEVER   

  **1.**   
 Mau akukwiya leka, Musanene konsetu;   
 Muwauze mau onse Asanadetse m’lomowo. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Kondananitu, Ati Ambuye, Ana mverani malamulowo;   
 Kondananitu, Ati Ambuye, Ana mverani lamulo.   

  **2.**   
 Cikonditu ndi coyera, Ndi cibwenzi comwenso,   
 Musaciononge konse Ndi mau akukwiyawo.   

  **3.**   
 Maubwenzi amasweka, Ndi mabanja omwenso;   
 Ka’mba mau a kukwiy aOlankhulidwa mwa nsontho.

title: 157 - Wakufetsa Ndi Kulira
markdown:
### 157 - Wakufetsa Ndi Kulira    
HARVEST TIME   

  **1.**   
 Wakufetsa ndi kulira, Mbeu za cikondico,   
 Wosatopa, wosagona, Yesu amdalitsa ’ye. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ona! mmera wakukondwa, Dzinthu dzonse dzacanso   
 Ona! M’minda mwayeratu, Layandika khunkhalo.   

  **2.**   
 Mvula idzatsirirapo, Dzuwa ’dzawaliranso,   
 Ndi zipatso zidzabala, M’mphamvu ya Mulunguyo.   

  **3.**   
 Fesa mbeu, usatope, Usaope konsetu,   
 Nkana utapeza bvuto, Udzatuta mokondwa.

title: 158 - Masika A Dziko Ayandika
markdown:
### 158 - Masika A Dziko Ayandika    
HASTEN ON, GLAD DAY   

  **1.**   
 Masika a dziko ayandikatu, Aitana Mbuye okololawo;   
 Ndi mina yeyera pa dziko lonse, Ndi mwini zotuta wayandikanso. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 ’Dzanitu msanga, Tengatu zotuta; Mdzatitengae ’fe, Kwathuko Alto, Tenor, ndi Bass;   
 Idzanitu angelo, msangatu; Tengereni zotuta mmwambamo.   
 Mudzatengetu ife, kunkatu, Kwathu mmwambamo.   

  **2.**   
 E, tsiku lopanda misozi konse, Layandika kudza mothamangatu;   
 Akubalalika ndi ucimowo, Mwasonkhetu nthawi isanathei.   

  **3.**   
 Ikomatu ntchito ya cikondico, Kasupe wosaphwa wa kumwambako;   
 Cikonditu ndico ciitana ’fe, Cigwiritsa ntchito, Cibalitsatu.

title: 159 - Mbuyanga Ndisowa Inu
markdown:
### 159 - Mbuyanga Ndisowa Inu    
HOW MUCH I NEED THEE   

  **1.**   
 Mbuyanga, ndisowa Inu! Ndine wosaukadi;   
 Mundigwire dzanja, Mbuye, Mudnilimbikitsetu. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Nthawitu zonsezo, Ndimasowa Inu, Mbuye!   
 Nthawitu zonsezo, Yesu mundisunge ’ne.   

  **2.**   
 Mundibveke zakuyera, Zanga ziri sanzatu;   
 Mndiphunzitse kupemphera, Mundipatse mphamvuzo.   

  **3.**   
 Mudnitsogolere, Mbuye, Ndekha ndilepheradi;   
 Myende nane pa myalapo, Ndinu nyali yangayo.   

  **4.**   
 Ndigapezetu mabvuto, Ofiritsa mtimanga;   
 Ndidzaumirira Inu Mdzandisangalatsadi.

title: 160 - Yesu Andisungetu!
markdown:
### 160 - Yesu Andisungetu!    
KEPT FOR JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Yesu andisungetu! Ndi mphamvu yaceyo;   
 Dziko lisandidetse; Kuti nditsate ’Ye. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Yesu andisungetu! Mbuye ndipempha ’Nu;   
 Inetu ndine cabe, cabe, Inu ndi zonsezo.   

  **2.**   
 Yesu andisungetu! Nditumikire ’Ye;   
 Ndicitetu kufuna, Kwa Yesu, Mbuyeyo.   

  **3.**   
 Yesu andisungetu! Dziko ndilisiya;   
 Ndikhaletu wofatsa, Woyera mtimamo.   

  **4.**   
 Yesu andisungetu! N’khaletu waceyo;   
 N’khaletu wace yekha, Ku nthawi zonsezo.

title: 161 - Tsamwali Ndiri Naye
162 - Yesu Anditsogozatu
163 - ’Mvani Yesu Aitana
markdown:
### 163 - ’Mvani Yesu Aitana    
HERE AM I, SEND ME   

  **1.**   
 ’Mvani Yesu aitana, Ndani angagwiretu?   
 Mindayo yayera kale, Ndani akakunkhemo?   
 Momvekadi aitana, Mphotho ’dzalandira ’we   
 Ndani angayankhe msanga, Ndine Mbuye, tumeni.   

  **2.**   
 Nkana sungapite mtari Ku maiko enawo,   
 Ungapeze anthu ena Apafupi ndi iwe.   
 Ngati sungalalikire mnga ngati Paulo,   
 Unganene za cikondi Ca Ambuye wakoyo.   

  **3.**   
 Ngati sungakhale mlonga Wocenjeza anthuwo;   
 Kuwauza anthu njira yonka nayo mmwambamo;   
 Pakupempherera ena, Ungagwire ntchitoyo.   
 Ungacite ngati Huri pothangata Moseyo.   

  **4.**   
 Mmene anthu alikufa, Mbuye aitanabe;   
 Wina asamamve nuti, singacite kanthui.   
 Gwira antchito wakupatsa, Nuigwire msangatu;   
 Ndi kuyankha poitana, Ndine Mbuye, tumeni.

title: 164 - Pa Mapazi Ace A Yesu
markdown:
### 164 - Pa Mapazi Ace A Yesu    
AT THE FEET OF JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Pa mapazi ace Yesu, Ndimva mau acewo!   
 Ee, pafupi ndi Ambuye, N’khale nthawi zonsezo;   
 Pa mapazi ace Yesu, Ndiyang’anan m’mbuyomo,   
 Ee, cikondi cace conse, Cakopadi mtimanga.   

  **2.**   
 Pa mapazi ace Yesu, Malo opambanawo;   
 Ndisiyepo chimo langa, Ndi kupeza mpumulo;   
 Pa mapazi ace Yesu, Ndimalira mtimanga,   
 Pomwe ndimapeza nsisi, Tsiku liri l onselo.   

  **3.**   
 Inu yesu mdidalitse, Ndigwadira Inuyo;   
 Muyang’anetu pa ine, Nane ndikuoneni;   
 Ndikhaletu nawo Mtima, Monga Yesu Mbuyeyo,   
 Ndionetseretu yesu, Cilungamo cangaco.

title: 165 - Ndikonda, Ndikonda Ambuyanga
markdown:
### 165 - Ndikonda, Ndikonda Ambuyanga    
I LOVE THEE   

  **1.**   
 Ndikonda, ndikonda Ambuyanga ’Nu;   
 Ndiknda Yesuyo, Mpulumutsitu.   
 Ndikonda inuyo mudziwadi;   
 Zintchito zinena kukonga kwanga.   

  **2.**   
 Ndikndwa, ndikondwa kopambanadi!   
 Ndaima pa phiri ndiyang’anitsa   
 Ku mzinda woyera ndkakhaleko,   
 Ndi Yesu, angeo, ndi anzangawo.   

  **3.**   
 Yesu ’Nu, Mp’lumutsi, mndidalitsetu,   
 Ndinutu cimwemwe mpumulo wanga.   
 Ndiyimba cikondi ca Mbuyangayo;   
 Cisomo canuco cindidzaza ’ne.   

  **4.**   
 Ndaniyo oposa Mpulumutsiyo?   
 Akonda inenso nan’thangata ’ne.   
 Ndiyamika Mbuye, ndiyimbira ’Ye,   
 Ndikndwa koposa mu mtimangamo.

title: 166 - Thanthwe Long’ambika
markdown:
### 166 - Thanthwe Long’ambika    
ROCK OF AGES   

  **1.**   
 Thanthwe long’ambikatu, Ndibisale momwemu!   
 Madzi ndipo mwaziwo Zoturuka m’nthtimo,   
 Zinditsuke m’mtima mbu! Zindilimbikitsetu.   

  **2.**   
 Nchito zanga zonsezo, Sizikondweretsa ’Nu;   
 Ndikazigwiritsadi, Ndikalira nsonizi,   
 Zonse sizikwanazi, Koma Yesu yekhayo.   

  **3.**   
 M’manja mwanga cabe bi, Mtanga ndingogwiradi;   
 Marisece mbveke ’ne, Ndiri ndekha, msunge ’ne,   
 Ndithawire mtsinjewo, Mudnitsuke m’mtimamo.   

  **4.**   
 M’moyo uno kunsiku, Pena ndimwaliratu,   
 Mmene ndidzaukanso Tionane masowo;   
 Thantwe long’ambikatu, Ndibisale momwemu.

title: 167 - Maziko Olimba
168 - Yehova Ndi Mbusa Wangatu
markdown:
### 168 - Yehova Ndi Mbusa Wangatu    
THE LORD IS MY SHEPHERED   

  **1.**   
 Yehova ndi Mbusa, Sin’dzasowai, Ndigona ku busa La msipu wace   
 Anditsogolera Ku madzi ace, Anditsitsimutsa Ndi mphamvu yace.   

  **2.**   
 Anditsogolera M’mabande mwace, Cifukwa ca dzina Lokondwedwalo.   
 Ngakhale ndiyenda pafupi infa, H! sindiopa Zoipa zonse.   

  **3.**   
 Cibonga ndi ndodo Za Mbusa wanga Zindisangalatsa Masiku onse.   
 Mundiyalikira Pa maso panga, Mkkuona kwa mdani Cakudya canga.   

  **4.**   
 Mudzoza mafuta Pa mutu panga, Mwadzaza cifundo Mu cikho canga   
 Udzanditsatira Ukoma wanu, Ndidzakhala nanu masiku onse.

title: 169 - Ugoneranji Mwana Wa Mfumu?
markdown:
### 169 - Ugoneranji Mwana Wa Mfumu?    
HEIR OF THE KINGDOM   

  **1.**   
 Ugoneranji mwana wa mfumu    
 Kwinanso  wayandikira mmwamba?   
 Dzuka, nyamuka, ubvale za nkhondo;   
 Bweratu nthawi isanathei.   

  **2.**   
 Anthu a mdziko adzanjenjemera,   
 Adzaopsedwa ndi kudza kwace;   
 Mvetsa migugu abwera Ambuye,   
 Mwana wa mfumu usacedwatu.   

  **3.**   
 Usacedwenso ndi zinthu za mdziko   
 Ulemerero udzathadi phe!   
 Dula zinsinga zolimba za mdani,   
 Mwana wa mfumu kondwera ndithu.   

  **4.**   
 Usayang’anetu kwina iyai,   
 Ona nonse kuwala m’mapiri monsemo,   
 Mwana wa mfumu zileke zonse.   
 Yembekeza ufumu wace;

title: 170 - Mulungu, Mfumu
markdown:
### 170 - Mulungu, Mfumu    
MY MAKER AND MY KING   

  **1.**   
 Mulungu, Mfumu ’Nu, Ndiribe mphamvutu,   
 Munandilenga, mundisunga Nthawi zonsezi   
 Munandilenga, Mundisunga Nthawi zonsezi.   

  **2.**   
 Ndiribe winanso, Ndimatsamira ’Nu;   
 Zabwino zanu zipambana, Ndicitenji ko?   
 Zabwino zanu zipambana, Ndicitenji ko?   

  **3.**   
 Ndipatse ciani ko? Poona zonsezi   
 Zakhala zanu kale ndithu,  Ndidzatani ko?   
 Zakhala zanukale ndithu.  Ndidzatani ko?   

  **4.**   
 Mufuna mtimangu, Ndipatsa msangatu.   
 Ndikhale wanu nthawi zonse, Mndilandire ’ne.   
 Ndikhale wanu nthawi zonse, Mndilandire ’ne.

title: 171 - Kunja Kuli Kuca Kodi
markdown:
### 171 - Kunja Kuli Kuca Kodi    
WHAT OF THE NIGHT?   

  **1.**   
 Kunja kuli kuca kodi? Mlonda, tandiuze ’ne.   
 Kodi nthanda yaturuka? Kodi kunja kwacatu?   
 Ukuona kodi kuti kwacadi?   
 Ukuona kodi kuti kwacadi?   

  **2.**   
 Tifunsitse za ulendo, Kodi ulikuthadi?   
 Tayandikatu ku doko, Kodi tingaoneko?   
 Tingaone dziko lakumwambako?   
 Tingaone dziko lakumwambako?   

  **3.**   
 Tipfuuletu kolimba, Kunja kuli kucatu;   
 Nthanda iri kuturuka, Ioneka mwambamo.   
 Kondwerani, tayandika kwathuko;   
 Kondwerani, tayandika kwathuko.   

  **4.**   
 Tiri nao mau ace, Otitsogolera ’fe.   
 Tithamangetu dzolimba, Kuti tikafikeko.   
 Pfuulani mokondwera m’mtimamo   
 Pfuulani mokondwera m’mtimamo.

title: 172 - Ambuye Wathu Yesu, Mubwera Liti?
markdown:
### 172 - Ambuye Wathu Yesu, Mubwera Liti?    
HOW LONG   

  **1.**   
 Ambuye wathu Yesu, Mubwera liti ko?   
 Mitima yatopadi, Mucedweranji ko?   
 Lidzadza liti tsiku lonyezimiralo   
 Limene anthu anu adzakondweranso?   

  **2.**   
 Musiya mpaka liti, Ee, nyumba yanuyo?   
 Mwacedwacedwa, Mbuye, Ambiri agwatu;   
 Agwidwa ndi za dziko, Antchito anuwo;   
 Atsalatu pang’ono Oyang’anira ’Nu.  

  **3.**   
 Dzutsani anthu anu, Tumani mauwo;   
 Amene anthu onse, Akudza Mbuyeyo!   
 Ziyake nyali zathu, tibvale bwinotu   
 Tikonze Mtima wathu, Kuona Mbuyeyo.

title: 173 - Ndikadakhala Naco Cikhulupiro
markdown:
### 173 - Ndikadakhala Naco Cikhulupiro    
O FOR A FAITH!   

  **1.**   
 Ndikadakala nacotu cikhulupiroco,   
 Sindinganjenjemeretu M’mabvuto monsemo.   

  **2.**   
 Coti ndikalangiswa ’ne, Ndisang’ung’udzatu,   
 Popwetekedwa iney o ndikulupira ’Ye.   

  **3.**   
 Comwe ciwala m’mtimanga, Pokhala m’mdimamo,   
 Cymene siciopatu, Sicikaikanso.   

  **4.**   
 Cosasunthika konsetu, Pokwiya dzikoli,   
 Macimo sangakope ’ne Akandidzera ’ne.   

  **5.**   
 Mbuye, patseni mphamvuyo, Cikhulupiroco.   
 Cinkana pansi panotu Ndidzakondwerabe

title: 174 - Akristu Ali Naco Ciyembekezo
markdown:
### 174 - Akristu Ali Naco Ciyembekezo    
HOW CHEERING!   

  **1.**   
 Akristu ali nacotu Ciyembekezoco   
 Cimatikondweretsatu M’mabuto monsemo   
 Cimatikondweretsatu M’mabuto monsemo.   

  **2.**   
 Cinema za mpumulowo Pokhala ndi Kristu.   
 Pamodzi ndi anzangawo tidzakhalitsako.   
 Pamodzi ndi anzangawo Tidzakhalitsako.   

  **3.**   
 Mayeso ndi macimowo Kulibe mdzikolo.   
 Misozi ndipo imfanso kulibe komweko   
 Misozi ndipo imfanso kulibe komweko.   

  **4.**   
 Masiku athe msangatu, Ambuye Adzetu.   
 Tilakalaka kuona Dzikolo ndi Inu   
 Tilakalaka kuona Dzikolo ndi Inu

title: 175 - Mpulumutsi, Mbusa Wathu
markdown:
### 175 - Mpulumutsi, Mbusa Wathu    
SAVIOUR, LIKE A SHEPHERD   

  **1.**   
 Mpulumutsi, Mbusa wathu, Mutisogolere ’fe;   
 Mutiwete, mutisunge, M’khola mwanu tinkemo;   
 Yesu wathu, Yesu wathu, Mnatigula ana ’nu,   
 Yesu wathu, Yesu wathu, Mnatigula ana ’nu.   

  **2.**   
 Ndife anu, mutikonda, Mutiperekeze ’fe,   
 Mcotse nsoni ndi zoipa, Mbweze osocerawo;   
 Yesu wathu, Yesu wathu, Mumve mapemperowo,   
 Yesu wathu, Yesu wathu, Mumve mapemperowo.   

  **3.**   
 Munanena mulandira Osauka omwewo;   
 Inu ndinu wa cifundo, Ndi wopulumutsayo;   
 Yesu wathu, yesu wathu, Tidzatu, tiana ’fe,   
 Yesu wathu, Yesu wathu, Tidzatu, Tiana ’fe.   

  **4.**   
 Tifunitsa Inu tere, Cifuniro canuco;   
 Mbuye wathu, Mpulumutsi, Mutikonze mkatimo.   
 Yesu wathu, Yesu wathu, Mtikondebe ana ’fe.   
 Yesu wathu, Yesu wathu, Mtikondebe ana ’fe.

title: 176 - Ciyembekezo Codala
markdown:
### 176 - Ciyembekezo Codala    
BLESSED HOPE   

  **1.**   
 Ciyembekezotu Codalitsikaco,   
 Coposa zithu zonsezo Za dziko lathuli.   

  **2.**   
 Iripo nyaliatu Yowala m’midmamo,   
 Yomwetu isonyeza ’fe, Za manda onsewo.   

  **3.**   
 Alipo mauwo Osangalatsatu,   
 Acotsa makaikowo A nsisi zacezo.   

  **4.**   
 Ee, mau Atimasula ’fe;   
 Ndiwotu nyali yathuyo, Ciyembekezero.

title: 177 - Mdziko La Kuwalalo
markdown:
### 177 - Mdziko La Kuwalalo    
NO NIGHT THERE   

  **1.**   
 M’dziko la kuunika, Kuli mzinda uko;   
 Iwo sudzacotsedwa, Kulibe usiku. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Misozi aicotsa, Imfa, nthanda ndi mantha   
 Sawerenganso, Zaka kulibe usiku.   

  **2.**   
 Zipata nza ngaletu, za ku mzinda uko;   
 Miseu nja golidi, Kulibe usiku.   

  **3.**   
 Zipata nzosatseka, za ku mzinda uko;   
 Komwe kuli mtsinjewo, kulibe usiku;   

  **4.**   
 Samasowa dzuwanso, a ku mzinda uko;   
 Yesu aunikako, Kulibe usiku.

title: 178 - Mmamawa Kapena Poturuka Dzuwa
markdown:
### 178 - Mmamawa Kapena Poturuka Dzuwa    
CHRIST RETURNETH   

  **1.**   
 Mmamawa kapena poturuka dzuwa, Ambuye Yesuyo ’dzafika mphamvu   
 Ndi ulemerero wokuru kutenga Anthu ace mu ace mu dzikoli. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Yesu, Mbuye wathu, ’Dzayimba mokondwa liti?   
 Kristu adza, Kristu adza, Aleluya amen, Aleluya amen.   

  **2.**   
 Kapena usana kapena madzulo, Kapena usiku pamene Ambuye   
 ’Dzafika mu ulemerero kutenga Anthu ace mu dzikoli.   

  **3.**   
 Tidzakondwa ngati tidzanka osafa, Opanda kudwala, cisoni maliro;   
 Kungokhwathulidwa podzadza kutenga anthu ace mu dzikoli.   

  **4.**   
 Tidzakondwa ngati tidzanka osafa, Opanda kudwala, cisoni, maliro;   
 Kungokhwathulidwa podzadzza kutenga Anthu ace mu dzikoli.

title: 179 - Wakukonzeka Pakubwera Mkwati?
markdown:
### 179 - Wakukonzeka Pakubwera Mkwati?    
BEHOLD THE BRIDEGROOM   

  **1.**   
 Wakonzeka pakubweraa mkwatiyo, Mkwatiyo?   
 Wakonzeka pakubwera mkwatiyo, mkwatiyo?   
 Onani adza; onani adza; Konzeka akubwera mkwatiyo. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Onani Mkwati, Yesu abweratu! Onani mkwati, Yesu abweratu!   
 Yang’anadza, yang’ana adza! Konzeka akubwera mkwatiyo.   

  **2.**   
 Konzetsani nyali zanu, adzatu, adzatu!   
 Konzetsani nyali zanu, adzatu, adzatu!   
 Akudza msanga; akudza msanga; konzeka moyo wanga wonse ’we   

  **3.**   
 Tidzakomana naye, Mkwatiyo, Mkwatiyo!   
 Tidzakomana naye, Mkwatiyo, Mkawtiyo!   
 Adzadi Yesu; adzadi Yesu; Tidzakomana naye Mkwatiyo   

  **4.**   
 Tidzayimba mokondwera, Aleluya, Kwa ’Ye   
 Tidzayimba mokondwera, Aleluya, Kwa ’Ye   
 Yang’ana adza; yang’ana adza; Yimbani, Aleluya, adzatu.

title: 180 - Sitidziwa Nthawi Ya Kudza
markdown:
### 180 - Sitidziwa Nthawi Ya Kudza   
WE KNOW NOT THE HOUR   

  **1.**   
 Sitidziwa nthawi yakudza kwa Mbuye, Koma zooneka pa dziko zinena   
 Adzabwera msanga, tikondwa, komatu sitidziwa nthawi. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Adzatu! Tikonzeke tilinde! Adzatu! Aleluya! Aleluya!   
 Adza ndi mphamvu za ’Tate wace, Komatu sitidziwa nthawi.   

  **2.**   
 Ku’nika kulipo kwa anthu a nzeru, Co’nadi ciripo mu mau a Mlungu,   
 Alembic anena momveka, komatu sitidziwa nthawi   

  **3.**   
 Tilinde, tipempe ndi nyali zowala, Tigwirenso ntchito mpakatu abwera   
 Poona zozizwa komatu sitidziwa nthawi.

title: 181 - Sitidziwa Kudza Kwa Mbuye
182 - Masomphenya A Tsikulo
markdown:
### 182 - Masomphenya A Tsikulo    
CLEAMS OF THE GOLDEN MORNING   

  **1.**   
 Tsiku lowala liri pafupi; Yesu adzatu   
 Kudzatenga ana Ace kunka nawo kwawoko 

  **CHORUS:**   
    Tone masomphenya a tsikulo   
 Limene liri kudza!   
 Ndi uleme’ro wa tsiku manda   
 Adzatseguka.   

  **2.**   
 Uthenga upite konse msanga, Kwa anthu onse;   
 Pompo Mkwati adza posacedwa, Liu limveka.   

  **3.**   
 Adzabwera ndi angelo onse, Mulemerero   
 Woweruza natengera Ace, Komwe sadzafa;   

  **4.**   
 Tidzakomana ndi okondedwa, Omwe adafa;   
 Misozi ya iwo akulira, Adzapukuta.

title: 183 - Analonjeza Ambuye Wathu
markdown:
### 183 - Analonjeza Ambuye Wathu    
HOLD FAST TILL I COME   

  **1.**   
 Analonjeza Ambuye wathu, Ndibweranso msanga kulandira ’nu   
 Gwiritsanitu coonadico, Msagonenso tulo, dikiranitu 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Gwiritsanitu coonadi, Apatsa inu ufumu wace,   
 Lowani nonse m’cimwemwe canga; Korona alinda, gwiritsanibe   

  **2.**   
 Tidikiratu ndi nyali zathu, Adzadzanso monga usiku mbala   
 Timadziwanso wayandikadi, Komatu za tsiku sitidziwai.   

  **3.**   
 Ciyembekezo ca mau ace, Kubwera kwa Yesu, Ambuye   
 Ndi lonjezano lopambanadi, Abweradi msanga, gwiritsanibe.

title: 184 - A M’dziko Akondweratu
markdown:
### 184 - A M’dziko Akondweratu    
JOY TO THE WORLD   

  **1.**   
 A m’dziko akondweretu, Ambuye adzanso   
 Mlandire Mfumu yathuyo Poyimba mokondwa,   
 Poyimba mokondwa, Poyimbayimba mokondwa.   

  **2.**   
 A m’dziko akondweretu, Adzalamula ’Ye.   
 Ndi anthuwo ayimbetu Kutama Mbuyeyo,   
 Kutama Mbuyeyo, Kutama Mbuye wathuyo.   

  **3.**   
 Adzalamula ma nsisi mitundu yonseyo;   
 Nawasonyeza onsewo Cikondi caceko,   
    Cikondi caceco, Cikondi cace Mbuyeyo.

title: 185 - Tinena za Dziko Lija
markdown:
### 185 - Tinena za Dziko Lija    
TO BE THERE   

  **1.**   
 Tinena za dziko lija Lokoma ndi lowalalo;   
 Tinena ubwino wace, Tidzazizwa pofikako,   
 Tinena miseu yace, Makanso a ngalewo;   
 Zokoma zosaneneka, Tidzazizwa pofikapo.   

  **2.**   
 Tinena zomasukatu M’ucimo ndi dm’mayesowo;   
 Kusiya mabvuto onse Tidzaziwa pofikako   
 Tinena cikondi cawo, Zobvala za oyerawo,   
 Za mpingo wa onka mmwamba, Tidzazizwa pofikako.   

  **3.**   
 Mukonze mu Mtima wanga, Ngakhale ndiyesedwatu,   
 Nanenso ndidziwe ndithu Khalidwe la kumwambako   
 Pomwepo mu dziko lija, Lokoma ndi lowalalo,   
 ’Dzayenda ndi angelowo, Ndi Yesu adzakhalako

title: 186 - Tabwera M’nyumbayi
markdown:
### 186 - Tabwera M’nyumbayi    
LORD, WE HAVFE MET   

  **1.**   
 Tabwera m’nyumbayi, Pa maso panupo;   
 Idzani, Mkhaletu pamodzi nafenso.   

  **2.**   
 Mitima yathuyo Isowa Inudi;   
 Tilakalaka Yesuyo Akhale m’moyomu   

  **3.**   
 Ndi Mzimu wanuyo Atithangatebe   
 Kumvera mau anuwo, Tikhalebe anudi.   

  **4.**   
 Muticotseretu Zoipa zathuzo;   
 Mukadzafika tsikulo, Mtitenge kwanuko.

title: 187 - Tiri Kuyimba Nyimbo Yomweyi
markdown:
### 187 - Tiri Kuyimba Nyimbo Yomweyi    
OUR PARTING HYMN   

  **1.**   
 Tiri kuyimba nyimbo yomweyi, Yakuyamika Mbuye wathuyo,   
 Mtendere wace titofunadi, Titapemphera tinke kwathuko.   

  **2.**   
 Titanka kwathu, mkhale nafeko, TIkufunani, Yesu, Mbuyathu,   
 Mutisungire nthawi zonsezo, Mutiyeretse m’mtima mwathu mbu!   

  **3.**   
 Usiku uno mutisungedi, Khalani mfupi mnyumba mwathumo   
 Mamawanso mudzatidzutse nji! Kuti tigwire ntchito zathuzo.   

  **4.**   
 Mtisogolere nthawi zonsezo, Kuyenda tokha sitikhozai   
 Ngati mukhala, Mbuye, mfupimo, Sitidzaopa kanthu kena bi.

title: 188 - Nkana Ndinacimwadi
markdown:
### 188 - Nkana Ndinacimwadi    
CHIEF OF SINNERS   

  **1.**   
 Nkana ndinacimwadi, Yesu anafera ’ne,   
 Anafera kutitu Ndikakhale mmwambamo;   
 Mtonga nthambi m’mpesamo Ndikhalatu mwacemo.   

  **2.**   
 Ee, cikondi caceco, Ncacikurukurudi,   
 Ciya ngati nyanjayo, Ndicotu cosathanso;   
 Ndandifunafuna ’ne, Ndikali wocimwabe.   

  **3.**   
 Nkana ndinacimwadi, Kristu akwaniratu;   
 Ndi zosowa zangazo Adzidziwa zonsezo;   
 Andipulumutsa ’ne, Andilimbikitsanso.

title: 189 - Tiribe Mzinda M’dzikoli
markdown:
### 189 - Tiribe Mzinda M’dzikoli    
NO ABIDING CITY HERE   

  **1.**   
 Tiribe mzinda m’dzikoli wolimba, wokhalitsanso   
 Komatu tikondwera ’fe, Tifuna mnzinda udzawo,   
 Tifuna mzinda udzawo.   

  **2.**   
 Tiribe mzinda m’dzikoli, Wolimba, wokhalitsanso;   
 Tifuna wina mmwambamo, Wowala ndi wosathanso   
 Wowala ndi wosathanso.   

  **3.**   
 Ee, malo a mtenderewo, Otopawo apumako!   
 Ndikhala ndi mapikawo, Ndikadaulukirako,   
 Ndikadaulukirako.   

  **4.**   
 Tonthola moyo wanga ’we, Adziwa nthawi Mlunguyo;   
 Ndicite ntchito yaceyo, Apatsa ’ne mpumulowo,   
 Apatsa ’ne mpumulowo.

title: 190 - Kondi Dzina La Yesu
markdown:
### 190 - Kondi Dzina La Yesu    
PRECIOUS NAME   

  **1.**   
 Konda dzinalo la Yesu, mwana wosauka ’we,    
 Ndilo lothandiza anthu, Khala nalo ponse phee. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Dzina la Yesuyo, Lokondwetsa onsewo.   
 Mwambamo, ponsepo, Litonthoza m’mtimamo.   

  **2.**   
 Konda dzina la Yesu, M’moyo mwanu monsemo;   
 Mmene muli kuyesedwa, Chula dzina lacelo.   

  **3.**   
 Dzina ili ndi lokoma, La Mombolo wathuyo,   
 Polandira ife mmwamba Tidzakondwererako.   

  **4.**   
 Mbuye Yesu timtamanda, Ndi zinyimbo zathuzo;   
 Mfumu ya mafumu onse, Yesu timayesadi.

title: 191 - Ndidziwitsitsa Yesu Ngwanga
markdown:
### 191 - Ndidziwitsitsa Yesu Ngwanga    
BLESSED ASSURANCE   

  **1.**   
 Ndidziwaitsitsa yesu ngwanga; Tsiku ndi tsiku ndimakondwera.   
 Anandigula ndi mwazi ’ce, Anandipatsa Mzimu wace. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Mau omwewo, Nyimbo yomwe, Yesu ndimtama tsiku lonse   
 Mau omwewo, Nyimbo yomwe, Yesu ndimtama tsiku lonse   

  **2.**   
 Nkamvera Yesu ndikondwatu, Ndiyang’anitsa Ambuyangayo   
 Ndipo angelo atengera Ine cisomo ndi cumanso   

  **3.**   
 Ndine kapolo Mbuyanga, Andigwiritsa zintchito zace   
 Ndimyembekeza ’dzabweranso, Adzanditenga kwawo mmwamba.

title: 192 - Pa Mtanda Pomwe Naferapo
markdown:
### 192 - Pa Mtanda Pomwe Naferapo    
GLORY TO HIS NAME   

  **1.**   
 Pa mtanda pomwe naferapo, Pomwe ndalira ndi chimolo,   
 Anandipaka ndi mwaziwo, Tama dzinalo. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Tama dzinalo, Tama dzinalo,   
 Anandipaka ndi mwaziwo, Tama dzinalo.   

  **2.**   
 Nandiombola mzoipazo, Yesu akhala mu mtimanga,   
 Nandilandira pa mtandapo, Tama dzinalo.   

  **3.**   
 Ndiye Kasupe Woyerayo! Ndikondwa kuti ndasambamo,   
 Yesu watsukadi inenso, Tama dzinalo.   

  **4.**   
 Idza kwa Yesu kasupeyo, Igwa pa mapazi acewo,   
 Sambamo lero uyeretu, Tama dzinalo.

title: 193 - Kodi Ungakhale Moyo Wonga Wacewo?
markdown:
### 193 - Kodi Ungakhale Moyo Wonga Wacewo?   
HIS WAY WITH THEE   

  **1.**   
 Kodi ungakhale moyo wacewo? Kumayenda naye m’njira monsemo?   
 Ungamlole Iye kunyamula nkhawazo? Mlole atsogole ’Ye. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Mwa mphamvu yace udzakhalatu, Wakumasuka, inde, m’wazi ’ce.   
 Cikondi ’ce cidzeze mtimako, Poyenda nawe zidamkonda ’Ye.   

  **2.**   
 Ungamlole kuti Iye amasule ’we" Kuti umutsate poitana ’Ye?   
 Ungamlole kucinjiriza Mbuyeyo? Mlole atsogole ’Ye.   

  **3.**   
 Monga ukapeza malo mu ufumuwo? Ungamyese akusamalire ’we?   
 Ungagwire ntchito yace kopambanadi? Mlole atsogole ’Ye.

title: 194 - Pakakhala Cikondi
markdown:
### 194 - Pakakhala Cikondi    
LOVE AT HOME   

  **1.**   
 Pakakhala cikondi, Banja likondwa; Pakakhala cimwemwe, banja likondwa   
 Mtendere ukhalitsa, Masiku awo onse; akhala mu mtendere, Akakondana.

 Mommo aphimmba ine naco cikondico.   

  **2.**   
 M’manja a Yesu wanga nkhawa zonsezi zi!   
 Momwe zoipa zanga sizindibvuta bi.   
 Mommo mulibe nsoni, mommo mokoma monse.   
 Sindiliramo msozi, nkondwa ndi Mtima wonse.   

  **3.**   
 Mtima umabisala m’manja mwa Yesumo,   
 Mbuye musunge ine, ndikhulupira ’Nu.   
 Mommo wa cete ine mpaka wocoka mdima,   
 Tsono ndiona komwe Yesu wokoma Mtima.

title: 223 - Niddzatsata Konseko
markdown:
### 223 - Niddzatsata Konseko    
FOLLOW ALL THE WAY   

  **1.**   
 Ndimva Mpulumutsi wanga, Mwa cifuno andi’tana   
 Ndimva mau ace ati, "Unditsate  tsate konseko 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ndidzasenza mtanda wanga,   
 Kutsatira Mpulumutsi;   
 Komwe anditsogolera,   
 Ndinke naye, naye, konseko.   

  **2.**   
 Njira ide mdilma bwanji, Mapazi atope bwanji;   
 Mtimawu ’dzalimbikira, Pakumtsata tsata konseko.   

  **3.**   
 Yesu atsogolerabe, Wondiunikira m’Mwamba,   
 Kafoka andilimbitsa, Pakumtsata-tsata konseko.   

  **4.**   
 Mobvuta antsogolera, Ndidya mana a kumwamba;   
 Ambuye ndkusowani, Pakumtsata-tsata konseko.   

  **5.**   
 Mwandilera ndi cikondi, Mundifungate dzolimba,   
 M’cisomo canu mndisunge, Pakumtsata-tsata konseko.

title: 224 - Nyali Yanu Iwalire
markdown:
### 224 - Nyali Yanu Iwalire    
LET THE LOWER LIGHTS BE BURNING   

  **1.**   
 Tate wathu wa Kumwamba, ’Natipatsa nyali’Ce,   
 Koma atiuza ife, Tiwalitse enawo. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Nyali yanu iwalire, Kusonyeza njirayo   
 Kwa ocimwa ndi ofo’ka, Njira yonka m’Mwambamo.   

  **2.**   
 Kuli mdima m’dziko lino, Ndi namondwe wa bvuto,   
 Obvutika alindira Nyali yotsogozayo.   

  **3.**   
 Konza nyali yako msanga, Pena wobvutikayo   
 Atayidwa mu mdima, Akapanda nyaliyo.

title: 225 - Uyang’ane Mdaniyo
226 - Pafupi Kukopeka
markdown:
### 226 - Pafupi Kukopeka    
ALMOST PERSUADED   

  **1.**   
 Pang’onong’ono kukopedwa;   
 Pang’onong’ono kumlandira,   
 Wina akutero, "Pita, Mzimu, pita,   
 Ndikaona nthawi n’kuitana."   

  **2.**   
 Pang’onong’ono, lero idza;   
 Pang’onong’ono usalubze,   
 Yesu akwitana, angelo mpafupi,   
 Anthu akupempha, Bweranitu.   

  **3.**   
 Pangonong’ono mwayi wathaa;   
 Pang’onong’ono tsoka ladza!   
 Kucedwa simwayi, ndi tsoka loopsa.   
 Ha, adaliradi, "Ndacedwatu!"

title: 227 - Pa Mtanda
markdown:
### 227 - Pa Mtanda    
AT THE CROSS   

  **1.**   
 Ambuye mwazi nakhetsa, Mfumu yanga nifa,

  **CHORUS:**

 Colemetsa mtimanga cacoka;   
 Mwa cikhulupiriro ndiona,   
 Ndikondwera kosaleka.   

  **2.**   
 Anabuula pa mtengo, Ndi zoipa zanga;   
 Kuya cisomo citere, Cikondi cakuya!   

  **3.**   
 Nzosatheka kubwezera Cikondi cotere;   
 Ndingodzipereka Mbuye, Zokhazo ndicita.

title: 228 - Muyamikeni Yesu
markdown:
### 228 - Muyamikeni Yesu    
PRAISE HIM! PRAISE HIM   

  **1.**   
 Nyamikeni! Yesu wodala Mombolo!   
 Yimba cikondi cozizwitsadi!   
 Mkondwereni mkuru wa angelo m’Mwamba,   
 Dzina lace lilimekezedwe!   
 Monga mbusa asunga ana,   
 M’mikono mwace awanyamula. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Myamikeni! Ali wamkuru koposa;   
 Myamikeni m’nyimbo zokondwera.   

  **2.**   
 Myamikeni! Yesu wodala Mombolo!   
 Zathu zocimwa nathira mwazi;   
 Ndiye Thanthwe lathu la cipulumutso,   
 Myamikeni Yesu wopacikikwa;   
 Mbukitseni! Yesu wotithangata,   
 Cikondi cosamariza ncace.   

  **3.**   
 Myamikeni! Yesu wodala mombolo!   
 Khomo m’mwamba mumveka hosanna!   
 Yesu Mbuye alera nthawi zosatha;   
 Mbveke krona Wansembe ndi mfumu!   
 Kristu adza wogonjetsa dzikoli,   
 Mphavu ndi ulemu ndi za Yesu.

title: 229 - Wa Yesuyo Ndani?
markdown:
### 229 - Wa Yesuyo Ndani?    
WHO IS ON THE LORD’S SIDE   

  **1.**   
 Wa Yesuyo ndani? Ngoona;   
 Mbali ndi ziwiri; Usankhe 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Sankha, sankha (Wa Yesuyo ndani? Wa Yesuyo ndani?)   
 Yabwino, yoipa? Usankhe   
 Sankha, sankha,   
 Yabwino, yoipa? Usankhe.   

  **2.**   
 Ambiri asankha Yoipa;   
 Yosalimba ndi ya mabodza.   

  **3.**   
 Gwirizana naye Ambuye,   
 Ndiyo mbali yokha yolimba.

title: 230 - Ndine Njira
markdown:
### 230 - Ndine Njira   
I AM THE WAY   

  **1.**   
 Monga nkhosa zotayika, Zomwazika konse;   
 Zasiya moyo, mtendere, Njira yandisowa? 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Sap, & alto: Ndine njira, co’nadi, moyo   
   Sungafike Atate koma mwa Ine,   
   Ndine njira, co’nadi, moyo,   
   Sungafike Atate komwa mwa Ine   Bass & Ten: Ndine njira, ndine njira, ndine njira co’nadi, moo   
   Sungafike Atate koma mwa ine   
   Ndine njira, ndine njira, ndine njira co’nadi, moyo   
   Sungafike Atate koma mwa ine   

  **2.**   
 Nkhawa zandisokoneza, Mulungu ndifuna;   
 Manena-nena ngambiri, Ndingagwire ziti?   

  **3.**   
 Kwa Kristu, njira, co’nadi Ndi moyo ndibweranso;   
 Adzandifitsa kwa Tate, Kumalo kosatha.

title: 231 - Lowetsa Yesu Mu Mtima
markdown:
### 231 - Lowetsa Yesu Mu Mtima    
LET JESUS COME INTO YOUR HEART   

  **1.**   
 Kodi watopa nazo zoipa, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima;   
 Ngati ufuna kutembenuka, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Leka kukayikatu; Usamkanenso lero,   
 Tsegula Mtima wako; Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.   

  **2.**   
 Ukafuna kukhala woyera, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima;   
 Madzi osamba ali pafupi, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.   

  **3.**   
 Ngati muli bvuto mtimamo, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima;   
 Ngati wapereweza za m’dziko, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.   

  **4.**   
 Abwenzi akakusandukira, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima;   
 Ndiye bwenzi losatekeseka, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima.   

  **5.**   
 Ngati uyimba nao odala, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima;   
 Udzalowe m’nyumba za mpumulo, Lowetsa Yesu mu Mtima. CHORUS (wotsiriza):   
 Leka kukayikaku; Usamkanenso lero,   
 Ndatsegula citseko, Kuti Yesu alowemo

title: 232 - Sindidzakusiya
markdown:
### 232 - Sindidzakusiya    
I WILL NEVER LEAVE THEE   

  **1.**   
 Sindidzakusiya konse, Sindidzakukananso;   
 Ndzatsogola ndzakusunga, Mongwa mwa dzina langa;   
 Musaope coipaco, pomvera malangizo.   

  **2.**   
 Mphepo zikaomba mkuntho, upemphere kwa Ine;   
 Ndidzakufungata iwe, Kukusamala bwino;

  **3.**   
 Mlengalenga pong’azima pakakoma ponsepo,   
 Madyerero osasowa, Zokondweretsa zokha;   
 Ndidzakhala nawe ndithu, Ndi kuti usacimwe.   

  **4.**   
 Ngati ndadodometsedwa, Ndi nkhawa ndi cisoni,   
 Ngakhaletu kuli nkhungu, Ndidzakuunikira,   
 Mbendera yokwezekayi, Ya cikondi canga njo.

title: 233 - Uzeni Nthano Yakale
markdown:
### 233 - Uzeni Nthano Yakale    
TELL ME THE OLD, OLD STORY   

  **1.**   
 Uze nthano yakale, Ya za kumwambako,   
 Za Yesu wacifundo, Za Yesu wokonda;   
 Pang’ono pang’onotu, monga kwa kamwana,   
 Poti ndiri wotopa, wopanda thandizo. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Nthano yakale uze, Nthano yakale uze,   
 Nthano yakale uze, Ya Yesu wokonda.   

  **2.**   
 Pang’ono ndi pang’ono, Motsimikizadi;   
 Pakuti ndaipadi, Yesu nandifera;   
 Nthano yonseyo uze, Musacite mphwayi,   
 M’nthawi yonse ya bvuto, Andisangalatsa.   

  **3.**   
 Nenatu yomwe ija, Ukhala ndi mantha,   
 Kuti dziko loipa, Ndilikondetsetsa;   
 Ulemu wa dzikowu Uyamba m’moyomu,   
 Uze nthano yakale; Yesu akuciza.

title: 234 - Yesu Nyali Ya Dziko
markdown:
### 234 - Yesu Nyali Ya Dziko    
JESUS THE LIGHT OF THE WORD   

  **1.**   
 Ha! Nayimba angelo, Yesu nyali ya dziko;   
 Mwana wabadwa Mfumu, Yesu nyali ya dziko. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Yenda m’kuunika kwabwiniko,   
 Idza kumene kuli cifuno,   
 Kuwala kwa msana ndi usiku;   
 Yesu, nyali ya dziko.   

  **2.**   
 Mapfukonu kondwani, Yesu nyali ya dziko;   
 Kondwani ndi a m’mwamba, Yesu nyali ya dziko.   

  **3.**   
 M’mwamba amlekeza, Yesu nyali ya dziko;   
 Yesu Mbuye wosatha, Yesu nyali ya dziko.   

  **4.**   
 Mfumu ya mtenderedi, Yesu nyali ya dziko;   
 Dzuwa la cilungamo, Yesu nyali ya dziko.

title: 235 - Ladzanso Tsiku Lakupumula
markdown:
### 235 - Ladzanso Tsiku Lakupumula    
AGAIN THE DAY RETURNS   

  **1.**

 Iye napuma ntchito zacezo,   
 Ndipo afuna tipumulenso.   

  **2.**   
 Tiyeni tonse pa Sabatali,   
 Timveretu Kufuna kwaceko;   
 Tsono poyimba ndi kupemphera,   
 Iye adzakondwera nafetu.   

  **3.**   
 Mbuye, Muchere khutu lanulo;   
 Mumve pemphero la t iana ’fe;   
 Kumbukirani lonjezanolo,   
 Mupulumutse otaikawo.   

  **4.**   
 Inu, Atate wakumwambako,   
 Ndinu wakuticinjiriza ’fe.   
 Ndinu wakutitsogoleranso,   
 Tikuongani nthawi zonsezo.

title: 236 - Cifundo Cace
markdown:
### 236 - Cifundo Cace    
HIS LOVING KINDNESS    

  **1.**   
 Dzuka moyo wanga kondwa, Yimbira cipulumutso;

  **CHORUS:**   
 Wacifuno, wacifundo cace, ncoposa!   

  **2.**   
 ’Nandiona wotayika, Anandikondabe ndithu;

  **3.**   
 Acurukadi adani, Ngakhale acite nazo,   
 Moyo wanga asungabe; cifundo cace, Ncamphamvu!   

  **4.**   
 Bvuto loda ngati mtambo, Lasonkhana ligundira,   
 Aima pafupi nane; Cifuno cace, Ncokoma!   

  **5.**   
 Mwini Mfumu akadzadza, Kudzatenga anthu ace,   
 Ndikayimba pa tsikulo Cifundo cace, Kosatha!

title: 237 - Akristu Limbikani!
markdown:
### 237 - Akristu Limbikani!   
STAND UP! STAND UP FOR JESUS!   

  **1.**   
 Akristu limbikani, imani mtimanji!   
 Mbendera nyamulani, musanthenthemerebi.   
 Wotsogolera wathu ndi Mwana wa Mulungu;   
 Adzagonjetsa onse, adani athuwo.   

  **2.**   
 Tigwire nkhondo yomwe ya Mbuye wathuyo;   
 Ticotse zakuipa zokhala mtimamo.   
 Sitikwanira tokha kuleka zinthu zomwe;   
 Koma Mbuyathu Yesu atithangatatu.   

  **3.**   
 Tsopano timenyana ndi zakuipazo,   
 Pamene nkhondo yatha tidzanka kwathuko;   
 Yesu adzalandira ankhondo ace onse,   
 Adzakhalitsa naye Kumwamba komweko.   

  **4.**   
 Limbikani anzathu! Msanga nkhondo itha   
 Lero kuli cinkhondo, mawa tigonjetsa   
 Kwa iye wolakika, adzakhala moyo;   
 Pamodzi ndi Mfumuyo ’dzakhala kosatha.

title: 238 - Akulowa M’zipata
markdown:
### 238 - Akulowa M’zipata    
SWEEPING THROUGH THE GATES      

  **1.**   
 Awa ndani pa tsidya la Nyanja, Omwe payola manda acetu,   
 Akondwera mwa Yesu? Asamba m’mwazi Wace. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Akulowa mzinda wa Yerusalemu,   
 Asamba m’mazi (wace) wa nkhosa;   
 Alowa m’zipata za Yerusalemu,   
 Asamba m’mwazi Wace.   

  **2.**   
 Awa ndiwo anapeza Yesu, Pamene anali anyamata,   
 Nalandira cisomo, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.   

  **3.**   
 Awa ndiwo mansautso yao, Anapeza kupuma mwa Yesu,   
 Mtendere mu mtimamo, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.   

  **4.**   
 Iwo adapirira mabvuto, Anapyola pakati pa moto:   
 Yesu ati idzani, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

title: 239 - Kodi Uli Kulemedwa?
markdown:
### 239 - Kodi Uli Kulemedwa?    
ART THOUGH WEARY?   

  **1.**   
 Kodi uli kulemedwa ndi zoipazo?   
 Idza kuno ati Yesu, Pumako.   

  **2.**   
 Ndikamzindikira n’inji Mbuye wangayo?   
 Ali ndi mabala m’manja mwacemo.   

  **3.**   
 Kodi ali ndi cilemba m’mphumi mwacemo?   
 E! Cilembaco ca minga cirimo.   

  **4.**   
 Ndikampeza ndikamtsata ninji pansi?   
 Masauko ndi misozi ziripo.   

  **5.**   
 Ndikamfunafuna Iye ndipezenjiko?   
 Kumariza kwa cisoni conse.   

  **6.**   
 Ndikampempha anditenge ati bwanji ko?   
 Ati Yesu "Idza msanga, idzatu."   

  **7.**   
 Kukamtsata, kukampeza ndisaukanji?   
 Oyera, atumwi, ati idzani. Amen.

title: 240 - Pakhomo
markdown:
### 240 - Pakhomo    
AT THE DOOR   

  **1.**   
 Mpulumutsi Pakhomopo! Agogoda mofatsa tu,   
 Walindira, alindabe, Musamcitire cipongwe.   

  **2.**   
 Akulangiza ugule Golide yo ndi Cobvala;   
 Dzoza maso, muonetu, Ucotse zonyasa zako.   

  **3.**   
 Mvera mau a umboni Ati usanke wacedwa;   
 Uli wonyoza, wofunda! Khala cangu usanduke.   

  **4.**   
 Ncito yayandika kutha, Kudandaulira kutha;   
 Wonynsa anyansebe tu, Woyera akhalebe conco.   

  **5.**   
 Lonyowa tsitsi ndi mame, Cifukwa akukondadi,   
 Dzuka! Tsegula citseko; Muuze asacedwenso.   

  **6.**   
 Alowe wokondedwayo; Upume pamaso pace.   
 Mwa ciyanjano cokoma Ndzadye naye, Iye nane.

title: 241 - Dziko Labwino
markdown:
### 241 - Dziko Labwino    
BEULAH LAND   

  **1.**   
 Ndapeza dziko lokoma, Ndi zinthu zonse ndi zanga;

  **CHORUS:**

 Ndipenyetsetsa ku Nyanja, Manyumba andikonzera,   
 Ndiyang’anitsa dzikolo, Komwe ndidzakhalitsako.   

  **2.**   
 Ndiyenda ndi Mpulumutsi, Andikondwera m’njiramo;   
 Anditsogolera bwino, Kumwamba ndikafikeko.   

  **3.**   
 Mphepo zinunkhira bwino, Za mitengo ya dzikolo,   
 Maluwa nao safota, Mitsinje simaumako.   

  **4.**   
 Mphepo za kumadzulozo, Ndi nyimbo kumwambako,   
 Angelo onyezimira Ayimba za mphamvu zace.

title: 242 - Codala Cikondi
markdown:
### 242 - Codala Cikondi    
BLEST BE THE TIE   

  **1.**   
 Codala cikondi, Cotiyanjanitsa!

  **2.**   
 Pa mpando, wa Mlungu, Wathu tipemphera;   
 Tisowa cinthu cimodzi, Cotisangalatsa.   

  **3.**   
 Timathandizana, Akatundu athu;   
 Timalirirana tonse, M’zobvuta zathuzo.   

  **4.**   
 Tikalekanatu, Timanva cisoni;   
 Tiyembekezerebetu, Kudzakomananso.

title: 243 - Dzuwa Moyowe
markdown:
### 243 - Dzuwa Moyowe    
ARISE MY SOUL, ARISE   

  **1.**   
 Dzuka moyo wanga, Cotsa mantha ako;   
 Nsembe ya mwaziwo, Cifukwa ca ine;   
 Indiimira ku mpando, Indiimira ku mpando;   
 Dzina langa lalembedwa.   

  **2.**   
 Kumwamba alipo, Kundipembedzera,   
 Cikondi caceco, Cinakhetsa mwazi;   
 Anatifera tonsefe, Anatiferea tonsefe,   
 Awaza mpando wansisi.   

  **3.**   
 Mabala asanu, Anapwetekapo;   
 Mutu "khululukani" Atitu "khululukani,"   
 Msalole wolapa afe!   

  **4.**   
 Tate amamumva, Wodzozedwa wace;   
 Sangacotse mwana, Wofika kwa Iye,   
 Mzimu ubvomera mwazi, Mzimu ubvomera mwazi,   
 Ndabadwira mwa mulungu.

title: 244 - Idza Kwa Yesu
markdown:
### 244 - Idza Kwa Yesu    
COME TO THE SAVIOUR   

  **1.**   
 ’Dza kwa YEsu, ’dza kwa Yesu   
 ’Dza kwa Yesu lero, lero, ’dza kwa Yesu,   
 ’Dza kwa Yesu lero.   

  **2.**   
 Pulumuka, pulumuka,   
 Pulumuka lero, lero pulumuka,   
 Pulumuka lero.   

  **3.**   
 Akhozadi, akhozadi,   
 Akhozadi lero, lero akhozadi,   
 Akhozadi lero.   

  **4.**   
 Muitane, muitane,   
 Muitane lero, lero muitane,   
 Muitane lero.   

  **5.**   
 Alindira, alindira   
 Alindira lero, lero alindira,   
 Alindira lero.   

  **6.**   
 Mkhulupire, mkhulupire,   
 Mkhulupire lero, lero mkhulupire   
 Mkhulupire lero.   

  **7.**   
 Adalitsa, adalitsa,   
 Adalitsa iwe, iwe adalitsa,   
 Adalitsa iwe.

title: 245 - Palibe Dzina Lina
markdown:
### 245 - Palibe Dzina Lina   
NO OTHER NAME   

  **1.**   
 Dzina lokhalo la Yesu, Ndilo dzina lokoma;   
 Likondwetsa ’ngelo m’mwamba, Ndi Akhristu tonsefe. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Dzina, dzina, Palibe longa la Yesu,   
 Dzina, dzina, Palibe longa la Yesu.   

  **2.**   
 Dzina lokha ndi la Yesu, Pamene ndibvutika;   
 Dzina lokha ndi la Yesu pamene ndikondwera.   

  **3.**   
 Ndikufuna kudzamwona, Podza mu’lemerero,   
 Ndidzamve Wacita bwino, Ndidzakondwererako.   

  **4.**   
 Ngat’ afuna ngwire ntchito, M’munda wace wa mpesa,   
 Kuli bwino Yesu yekha, ’Dalitse ntchito zanga.   

  **5.**   
 Ngat’afuna kuti ndife, Akhudze thupi langa,   
 Kukhale bwino ndi Yesu, Ndikhulupira mwa’ye.

title: 246 - Mnenere Yesu Liu
markdown:
### 246 - Mnenere Yesu Liu    
JUST A WORD FOR JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Mnenere Yesu liu; Bwenzi la pamtima,   
 Utiuzetu zomwe; Anakucitira. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Pomunenera Yesu Zidzatithandiza;   
 Mau pang’ono pokha, Nenga, yimba, pempha.   

  **2.**   
 Mnenere Yesu liu; Wakhululukidwa,   
 Ndi kuyesayesako, Ufike kumwamba.   

  **3.**   
 Mnenere Yesu liu, Kukana sinditha;   
 Ndikonda Mpulumutsi, Wondiombolayo.   

  **4.**   
 Mnenere Yesu liu, Usataye nthawi;   
 Wozemba ntchito yace, Apeza cisoni.   

  **5.**   
 Mnenere Yesu, liu, Pocepa nkhongono;   
 Dzuka ukafooka, Mlekere zinazo.

title: 247 - Angelo Ayimba Kumwamba
markdown:
### 247 - Angelo Ayimba Kumwamba    
SING THE BELLS OF HEAVEN   

  **1.**   
 Mabelo kumwamba! Kuli cimwemwe,   
 Akatembenuka wocimwa;   
 Tate amucingamira kunjira,   
 Mwana wotopa wosocera. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Angelo ayimba kumwamba;   
 Ulemu, ulemu m’mingoli,   
 Opulumukawo abvekedwa mbu,   
 Ayimbira molemekeza.   

  **2.**   
 Mabelo kumwamba! Kuli cimwe   
 Wotayika wabvomeredwa;   
 Wocimwayo wabwezedwa ku chimo,   
 Wabadwanso ngati walero.

title: 248 - Yesu Mnzarete Apita
markdown:
### 248 - Yesu Mnzarete Apita   
JESUS OF NAZARETH PASSETH BY   

  **1.**   
 Cikhamuci cifunanji Coyenda motanganidwa. Cosankhana tsiku ntsiku? Ndiuzenji acitanji?   
 Khala cete ndikuuze; "Yesu Mnazarete apita"   
 Khalal cete ndikuuze; "Yesu Mnazarete apita.’’   

  **2.**   
 Yesuyo ndani? Wakuti agwedeza mudzi conci?   
 Mlendo cabe waluntha Kugwedeza anthu conci?   
 Modzidzimutsa nayankha; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"   
 Modzidzimutsa nayankha; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"   3 . Yesu! Pansi natsikira Ngati munthu nayendapo;   
 Opsinjika nawapeza, Odwalal opundukawo,   
 Akhungu nakondwa kumva; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"   
 Akhungu nakondwa kumva; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"   

  **4.**   
 Lero ayenda ponsepo Tiona mapazi ace;   
 Ayenda m’nchito zathuzo, Adza kwathu kudzakhala;   
 Mokondwa tipfuulitse: "Yesu Mnazarete apita;   
 Mokondwa tipfuulitse; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"   

  **5.**   
 Idzani olemedwanu! Mupume mpeze mudziwo   
 Otayika a Atate, Bwerani mulandire;   
 Oyesedwanu thawani; "Yesu Mnazaretu apita,"   
 Oyesedwanu thawani; "Yesu Mnazaretu apita."   

  **6.**   
 Ukanabe naitana, Nunyoza cikondi cace,   
 Cisoni adzakusiya Maomboledwe acewo;   
 Udzati mayo ndacedwa "Mnazarete wandisiyadi."   
 Udzati mayo ndacedwa "Mnazarete wandisiyadi."

title: 249 - Nkhosa Zambiri M’Kholamo
markdown:
### 249 - Nkhosa Zambiri M’Kholamo   
THERE WERE NINETY AND NINE   

  **1.**   
 Nkhosa zace zambiri m’kholamo   
 Anasunga mbusayo   
 Anasunga mbusayo   
 Imodzi inasocerera,   
 Yotaika ku thengo.   
 Kutari ku phiri loopsya   
 Kutari ndi mbusa waceyo   
 Kutari ndi mbusa waceyo.   

  **2.**   
 Mbuye, muli zambiri m’kholamu   
 Kodi sizikwanira?   
 Nayankha mbusa, ndi yangayo   
 Imene yataika.   
 Ngakhale njoopsya njirayo,   
 Ndilinga ku phiri kupeza.   
 Ndilinga ku phiri kupeza.   

  **3.**   
 Koma opulumuka sadziwa   
 M’khwawa mbusa napyola,   
 Ndi mdima wo’psya usikuwo   
 Polonda nkhosayo.   
 Anamva kulira kutari   
 Mapeza yofo’ka, ikufa.   
 Mapeza yofo’ka, ikufa.   

  **4.**   
 Mbusa, ndiona mwazi m’njirayi;   
 Ndi cifukwa ciani ko?   
 Ndinaukhetsa potsata’we,   
 Kubwenza ku kholako.   
 Ndi m’manja mwalaswa bwanjimo?   
 Ndalaswa pofunafuna’we.   
 Ndalaswa pofunafuna’ we.   

  **5.**   
 Ndipo ponse pa phiri ndi m’dambo,   
 Ndi m’makwawa ponsepo   
 Namveka liu lopfuula,   
 Kondwerani ndapezayo.   
 Angelo a Mlungu nayankha.   
 Ambuye napeza nkhosayo.   
 Ambuye napeza nkhosayo.

title: 250 - Chimo Musalole
markdown:
### 250 - Chimo Musalole   
YIELD NOT TO TEMPTATION   

  **1.**   
 Chimo musalole, Limacimwitsa,   
 Gonjetso limodzi Libweza wina;   
 Pitani m’tsogolo, Zoipa leka,   
 Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Funsa Mbuye thandizo   
 Aszakusunga iwe;   
 Ali wolola Iye;   
 Adzasunga iwe.   

  **2.**   
 Thawani oipa, Ndi otukwana,   
 Lemekeza Mlungu, Osamamnyoza;   
 Khala waulemu, Ndi wacifuno,   
 Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga.   

  **3.**   
 Kwa wolakikayo, Korona ’patsa,   
 Mwa cigonjetsoco, Kwa opirira;   
 Mpulumutsi wathu, Adzalimbitsa,   
 Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga.

title: 251 - Kulira Sikanthu
markdown:
### 251 - Kulira Sikanthu   
WEEPING WILL NOT SAVE US   

  **1.**   
 Kulira sikanthu  Ngakhale nkhope igwe,   
 Singaletse matsoka, Singatsuke machismo    
 Kulira sikanthu. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Yesu nafa pa mtanda, Yesu nandiferatu,   
 Yesu andilindira Kundi pulumutsa.   

  **2.**   
 Nchitonso sikanthu  Ngakhale ikometse   
 Maganizo oyera, Sangandikonzetsenso    
 Nchitonso sikanthu.   

  **3.**   
 Kudikira sikanthu  Ndigona wotayika   
 Ndimva kuitanantu; Kudika ndifa cabe    
 Kudika sikanthu.   

  **4.**   
 Yesu Mpulumutsi Amene nandifera,   
 Ndikhulupira Inu, Mundipulumutsenso    
 Mundipulumutsa.

title: 252 - Wocimwa Iwe, Bwera
markdown:
### 252 - Wocimwa Iwe, Bwera   
COME EVERY SOUL BY SIN OPPRESSED   

  **1.**   
 Wocimwa iwe, bweratu, Kwa Yesu, Mbuyeyo;   
 Atero Iye, pumatu, Umvere mauwo. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Khulupira mau ace onse a Mbuyathuyo,   
 Uli nawo pakumvera, Inde, moyowo.   

  **2.**   
 Ambuye Yesu anatsira Mwazi wace pyu,   
 Timira m’mwazi womwewo, iyerayera mbu.   

  **3.**   
 Wa moyo ndiye Yesudi, Zoona zacezo,   
 Akhalal iye njiratu yofika mmwambamo.   

  **4.**   
 Tiyeni tonse, tinkeko, Ulendo wathuwo,   
 Ku dziko lace mmambamo, ’Dzakhale nayeko.

title: 253 - Mbusa wa Israyeli
markdown:
### 253 - Mbusa wa Israyeli   
HE CALLS HIS LAMBS   

  **1.**   
 Mbusa wa a Israyeli, Wocititsa cidwi;   
 Imva aitana nkhosa Adzatifukate!   

  **2.**   
 Akaitana zimadza, Satonza maina;   
 Amazidalitsa zonse, Mwinu wa angelo.   

  **3.**   
 Tibwera nazo kwa Inu, Tikupatsirani,   
 Ife tiri anu omwe, Ana’thu ndi anu.

title: 254 - Dzina La Yehova
markdown:
### 254 - Dzina La Yehova   
PRAISE YE JOHAVAH’S NAME   

  **1.**   
 Dzina la Yehova, Liyamikidwetu, tilopa;   
 Kumwamba-mwambako, Cikondi coposa,   
 Konseko kumveka Mphamvu yace.   

  **2.**   
 Lipenga limveke Lacigonjetsoco, konse konse;   
 Mngoli ukhalepo; Alimba abwino;   
 Amveke ponsepo, omtamanda.   

  **3.**   
 Poyimba mokweza, Kungani zingwezo, zotengana!   
 Atipatsa mpweya; Mpweya wodzazatu,   
 Ufulu wacewo, Tiyamike.

title: 255 - Ndikusowani Yesu
markdown:
### 255 - Ndikusowani Yesu    
I NEED THEE PRECIOUS JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Ndikusowani Yesu, Ndiri waumphawi;   
 Mlendo wopanda malo, Za dziko ndilibe.   
 A Yesu Mudnikonde, Mundicingamire,   
 Ndikunditsogolera, Mphamvu yanga ndinu.   

  **2.**   
 Ndisowa Mtima wanu, Kudziwa nkhawazo,   
 Ndi mayesero anga, Ndi zacisonizo.   
 Nsowa Mzimu Woyera, Womandiphunzitsa,   
 Kundiuzane Yesu, Ndi Mwana wa nkhosa.  

  **3.**   
 Ndikusowani Yesu, Ndionane nanu,   
 Mu uta-wa-lezamo, Pa cimpando canu.   
 Ndi ogulidwa m’mazi, Ndikakondwerere   
 Nyimbo zosadukiza, Ndikumpenyetsetsa. Amen.

title: 256 - Mulungu Munathangata
markdown:
### 256 - Mulungu Munathangata   
OUR HELP IN ACES PAST   

  **1.**   
 Mulungu munathangata, Mudzathangathabe;   
 Woticinjiriza mz’opsa, Kwanu mutifitse!   

  **2.**   
 Mwa mthunzi wa mpando wanu, Ndimo tibisala   
 Dzanja lanu liposadi, Tiri mosunguka.   

  **3.**   
 Dziko linakhazikidwa Mapiri naima,   
 Mulungu wosamariza, Zako zosathera   

  **4.**   
 Zaka ngati usiku, M’mawa kusanace.

title: 257 - Olimba Ngati Thanthwe
markdown:
### 257 - Olimba Ngati Thanthwe   
FIRM AS A ROCK   

  **1.**   
 Mapiri sagwedezeka, Ifenso comweco;   
 Olimba gwa ngati thanthwe; Ace a Yehova.   

  **2.**   
 Phiri ndi khoma kulibe, Lofanana naye;   
 Langwiro mwa ilo lokha, Akunja sangalione.   

  **3.**   
 Khulukirani anu, kwa zolakwa zao zonse,   
 Mutithandize kusunga Malamulowo angwiro.

title: 258 - Chikhulupiriro Cimodzi Ca Moyo
markdown:
### 258 - Chikhulupiriro Cimodzi Ca Moyo    
ONE LIVING FAITH   

  **1.**   
 Lamulo la Mulunguli, Sicinthu copanda pace;   
Ndi lokhalitsa myayadi, Simau cabe, ndi moyo.

  **2.**   
 Lamulo lanu loyera, Mutikhulukirefe,   
Langwiro mwa ilo lokha, Akunja sangalione.

  **3.**   
 Khululukirani anu, Kwa zolakwa zao zonse,   
Mithithandize kusunga Malamulowo angwiro.

title: 259 - Tidzakomana Kodi?
markdown:
### 259 - Tidzakomana Kodi?   
SHALL WE MEET?   

  **1.**   
 Tidzakomana patsidya, Mafunde akadzatha?   
 Kowala kosalekeza, Kulibe cisoninso? 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Tidzakomanako? Tidzakomane patsidya?   
 Tikakomane patsidya, Mabvuto akadzatha?   

  **2.**   
 Tikakomana padoko, Akadzatha mabvuto?   
 Tidzaiponya nangula Pagombe lokomalo?   

  **3.**   
 Tikakomana m’mudzimo; Nyumba zonyezimira,   
 Makomanso nga yasipi, omangidwa ndi Mbuye?   

  **4.**   
 Tikakomana ndi Yesu Potenga anthu ace;   
 Ubwino tidzaudziwa Ntakhala mu mpando’ce.

title: 260 - Dambo La Byula
markdown:
### 260 - Dambo La Byula   
VALE OF BEULAH   

  **1.**   
 Ndipitira kunsi kwa dambo la cipululu,   
 Liri dambo lokongola lochedwa la Byula   
 Koma ndapezanso monse momera maluwa,   
 Mpulumutsi mwini wace ayenda ndi ine.   

  **2.**   
 Palibe mthunzi wotsiriza panjira panga,   
 Kuunika kwa ulemerero kuwalitsa;   
 Am’mwamba andiyimbira nyimbo zokongola,   
 Apokolezana bwino kundicingamira.   

  **3.**   
 Ndiri kunka ndi nsangala ku mzinda wowala,   
 Nsangalazo ziwalitsa njira tsiku ntsiku;   
 Ndasendeza zipata za mzinda wakuwala   
 Khwalalalo lindifitsa mzinda wa cikondi.

title: 261 - Dambo Lokongola La Edene
markdown:
### 261 - Dambo Lokongola La Edene   
BEAUTIFUL VALLEY OF EDEN   

  **1.**   
 Dambo labwino Edene, Muli bata msana;   
 Mitima ya otopabe Ipuma nicira. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Dambo labwino Edene, Kwao kwa odala,   
 Ndazunzikadi ndi mabvuto, Ndidzatu ndidzapume.   

  **2.**   
 Mtima wosowa woliraa, Ndzapeza mwayi,   
 Nuimba nyimbo nda’ngelo, Akutaritari.   

  **3.**   
 Ali kwao Mpulumutsi; Ndi oomboledwa   
 Dziko la ulemerero, Imvani nyimboyo.

title: 262 - Kristuu Kapena Barab
markdown:
### 262 - Kristuu Kapena Baraba   
CHRIST OR BARABAS   

  **1.**   
 Nditani naye Yesu? Waima panoyu   
 Wabvala cinyong’onyo, Ndi minga pamutu. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Tsopano ndifunse, Muyankha cotani?   
 Ndimpacike Mfumu Yesu, Atsale Baraba?   

  **2.**   
 Ndimasule mbalayi, Cimunthu ca dama?   
 Wocimwa, ngosacimwa? Mukanapo yani?   

  **3.**   
 Funsotu loopsali! Litengeni bwino,   
 Nsisi zilindirabe, Koma mwa mabvuto.   

  **4.**   
 Mpando waciweruzo sungakane dziko?   
 Anapfuula "Cotsa, Mumpacike Yesu!"   

  **5.**   
 Si kwa ocimwa okha Funso linenetse;   
 Mvani Akristu nomwe, Ora loyesedwa

title: 263 - Mvani Mau A Ambuye
markdown:
### 263 - Mvani Mau A Ambuye   
HEAR THE WORDS OF SCRIPTURE   

  **1.**   
 ’Mvani mau a Ambuye wathuyo   
 Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,   
 Perekani ndi mitima yanuyo,   
 Mulandire madalitso. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,   
 Mndidyese ’ne, eti Mbuyeyo.   
 Ndizakupatsa madalitso,   
 Ndipo mudzasowa nawotu malo.   

  **2.**   
 Mukufuna kodi mphamvu yaceyo?   
 Mudze nazo zacikhuumi m’nkhokwe   
 ’Dzanitu cifupi ndi Ambuyeyo,   
 Polandira madalitso.   

  **3.**   
 Muli nako kanthu ndi Ambuye ko?   
 Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,   
 Mudze nazo monga mwa lonjezo ’ce,   
 Ndipo mudzadalitsidwa.   

  **4.**   
 Yamikani Mbuye pompemphera ’Ye,   
 Podza nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,   
 Khulupirirani mau acewo,   
 Ndi kumuthokoza Iye.   

  **5.**   
 Yimbirani ndi cimwemwe nyimbozo,   
 Mutabwera nazo zacikhumi,   
 Tipfuule mokondwera tonsefe,   
 Ka’mba tinadalitsidwa.

title: 264 - Paciyambi Mlunguyo
markdown:
### 264 - Paciyambi Mlunguyo   
HOLY DAY, JEHOVAH’S REST   

  **1.**   
 Paciyambi Mulunguyo Analenga dzikoli,   
 Tsono ’napumuladi Lacisanu nciwiri. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Tikondwera, tikondwera   
 Tikondwera podza pa Tsiku la Sabatalo.   

  **2.**   
 Mlungu ’napatulanso Tsiku lakupumalo.   
 ’Nalipatsa kwa ife Ndi Sabata lacelo.   

  **3.**   
 Anthu ace kalelo Anasunga tsikulo,   
 Ndi pobwera Yesuyo Iye anasunganso.   

  **4.**   
 Osanthula m’bukumo, Akuona kutitu   
 Mlungu sanasinthei, Tsiku ndace lomweli.   

  **5.**   
 Ndipo ati m’bukumo Podzabwera Yesuyo   
 Anthu adzasungabe Tsiku la Sabatalo.

title: 265 - Mtenderewo
markdown:
### 265 - Mtenderewo   
PEACE, PERFECT PEACE   

  **1.**   
 Mtenderewo, m’dziko la mdimali;   
 Mwazi wa Yesu unong’oneza.   

  **2.**   
 Mtenderewo, m’ntchito zocuruka;   
 Ntchito ya Yesu ndiko kupuma.   

  **3.**   
 Mtenderewo, m’bvuto lotizinga;   
 Mtendere uli mwa Yesu yekha.   

  **4.**   
 Mtenderewo, anga ali m’tari   
 Yesu asunga ine ndi iwo.   

  **5.**   
 Mtenderewo, uli m’tsogolomo;   
 Tidziwa Yesu ali pa mpando.

title: 266 - tNdidzakutsatani
markdown:
### 266 - tNdidzakutsatani   
I WILL FOLLOW THEE   

  **1.**   
 Yesu nditsata Inu, Ndamva mundiitana;   
 Nkonda Inu, ndidzadi, Munditsogolere. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ndikutsatani, ndikutsatani,   
 Ndikutsatani komwe muntsogoza.   

  **2.**   
 Timaso tiphophonya, Mapazi asocera;   
 Ndifooka mwinamo, Mundilimbikitsa.   

  **3.**   
 Zisoni zindipinga, Ndipusa ndi zoipa,   
 Ndidzalimbikitsidwa, Potsatira Inu.

title: 267 - Fesa Mbeuu Za Cikondi
markdown:
### 267 - Fesa Mbeuu Za Cikondi   
SCATTER SEEDS OF KINDNESS   

  **1.**   
 Tisonkhanitse zabwino, M’njira mwathu monsemo;   
 Tisunge tirigu yekha, Titaye zacabezo;   
 Tipeze zokondweretsa M’madalitso a lero,   
 Mwa cipiriro ticotse Minga yokhumudwitsa. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ufese zacifundo, Ufese zacifundo   
 Ufese zacifundo, Zomwe tidzakolola   

  **2.**   
 Sitisamala maluwa Ndi mbalame poyimba,   
 Mpaka mbalame ndiponso maluwa zitacoka;   
 Dzuwa sitisamala Pa nthawi ya cilimwe,   
 Akafikanso mazizi Nthaawiyo tilifuna.   

  **3.**   
 Mwana akacita ngozi Poswa cikho comwera   
 Kodi mukalipa ko’psa Poturutsa tsinyalo?   
 Mukudziwa kuti mawa Adzakhala wakufa,   
 Kodi pakukwiya naye Mupsa Mtima leroli?   

  **4.**   
 Poganizira za m’mbuyo Za zomwe tinacita,   
 Za mauwo okalipa Okhumutsidwa ena,   
 Ndi nchito zosaganiza; Izi zitikumbutsa   
 Kufetsatu zacifundo zomwe tidzakolola.

title: 268 - Bata Ndu!
markdown:
### 268 - Bata Ndu!   
PEACE STILL   

  **1.**   
 Mbuye, Nyanja yakalipa, Mafunde akweretsa!   
 Mlengalenga nawonso wada; Kodi tifere m’madzi;   
 Kodi simukusamala, Mugoneranjiko?   
 Pamene ife tiri ndi mantha, Kodi tifere m’madzi? 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Namondweyo andimvera Ine, bata ndu! (Bata ndu!)   
 Ngakhale Nyanja zikalipe,   
 Ziwanda, anthu, ngakhale zinazo,   
 Madzi sangamize bwato Mwini   
 Nyanja ndi mtunda ali momwemo;   
 Zonse zingondimvera Ine; Batu ndu, bata ndu!   
 Zonse zingondimvera Ine; Batadi ndu!   

  **2.**   
 Mbuye bvuto mu mtimamu Landibvuta leroli;   
 Kucirimika konse kwatha; Ndipulumutsenitu   
 Nkhwenkhwe ya chimo yozunza, Inditsirizitsa;   
 Ndamuka ine, ndamuka, Mbuye! Dzandipulumutseni.   

  **3.**   
 Mbuye zobvutazo zatha, Kwagwa bata tsopano,   
 Kwawalal ngati kalirole, Ngati ndiri Kumwamba;   
 Msandisiyenso Ambuye, Tikhale Pamodzi;   
 Ndikafike ku gombe lodala, Mukandipumulitse.

title: 269 - Mpulumutsi Wozizwitsa ndi Yesu
markdown:
### 269 - Mpulumutsi Wozizwitsa ndi Yesu   
A WONDERFUL SAVIOUR IS JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Mpulumutsi wozizwitsa ndi Yesu,   
 Mpulumutsi wozizwitsa,   
 Andibisira moyo wanga m’thanthwe,   
 Ndiona zokondweretsa. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Andibisira moyo wanga m’thanthwe,   
 Abisira moyo wanga louma;   
 Abisira aphimba dziko louma;   
 Moyo wanga aika pobisika,   
 An’phimba ndi dzanja lace.   
 An’phimba ndi dzanja lace.   

  **2.**   
 Mpulumutsi wozizwitsa ndi Yesu   
 Anditulira Katundu,   
 Andicirikiza sindidzasowa,   
 Wondipatsa mphamvu ndiye.   

  **3.**   
 Apatsa madalitso ocuruka,   
 An’dzanso umulungu,   
 Ndiyimba mokondwa ndilemekeza   
 Mpulumutsi ndi wangadi.   

  **4.**   
 Ndikabvekedwa zowala ndiyera,   
 Kukomana naye m’mwamba,   
 Ndapulumukadi, m’cikondi cace   
 N’dzafuula ndi anzanga.

title: 270 - Nkhoswe Yathu
markdown:
### 270 - Nkhoswe Yathu   
THE COMFORTER WITH US   

  **1.**   
 Mpulumutsi potsazika, Ndi mau okonda,   
 Msangalatsi, adzakhala Nkhoswe yathu.   

  **2.**   
 Anadza kudzatikonza, Wansisi, wolola   
 Kupeza mmodzi wodekha Apumemo.   
   

  **3.**   
 Timva mau’ce odekha Ocokera m’mwamba,   
 Otsutsa chimo odekha aitana   

  **4.**   
 Ukoma wonse ndi wace, Cigonjetso conce,   
 Ganizo laciyeronso, Zonse nzace.   

  **5.**   
 Mzimu wanu waciyero, Mtimvere nsisitu;   
 Mukhale m’mtima mwathu, Ana ace.

title: 271 - Nkana Chimo Nlalikuru
markdown:
### 271 - Nkana Chimo Nlalikuru   
THO’ YOUR SINS BE AS SCARLET   

  **1.**   
 Nkana chimo nlikuru, lingakanganulidwe;   
 Nkana chino nlikuru, lingakanganulidwe;   
 Nkana chimo ngori’ra, ayeretsedwa;   
 Nkana chimo nlikuru, Nkana chimo nlikuru,   
 Lingakanganulidwe; Lingakanganulidwe.   

  **2.**   
 Imva liu lipempha, "Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo;"   
 Imva liu lipempha, "Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo."   
 Ali ndi nsisi zambiri, ndi cikondico.   
 Imva liu lipempha, Imva liu lipempha,   
 "Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo: Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo."   

  **3.**   
 Akukhululukira, sadzakumbukiranso;   
 Akukhululukira, sadzakumbukiranso;   
 "Ndiyang’aneni anthuni," ati Mbuyeyo   
 Akukhululukira, Akukhulukira,   
 Sadzakumbukiranso, Sadzakumbukiranso.

title: 272 - Ponya Cingwe Ca Moyo
markdown:
### 272 - Ponya Cingwe Ca Moyo   
THROW OUT THE LIFE-LINE   

  **1.**   
 Pabvuta pa Nyanja, ponya cingwe,   
 Pali mbale apulumutsidwe;   
 Mbale wa mnzathu, ndani angathe   
 Kuponya cingweco, kumpulumutsa. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ponya cingweco! Cingwe ca moyo!   
 Alikunka ndi madzi!   
 Ponya cingweco! Cingwe ca moyo!   
 Wina amira lero.   

  **2.**   
 Ponya cingweco mofulumira;   
 Ucedweranji ndi kujejema?   
 Ana amira, fulumiratu,   
 Ukampumulutse msanga, msangatu.   

  **3.**   
 Ponya anthuwo azunzikatu,   
 Atatha koopsa sungafike;   
 Mphepo zabvuto ndi za matsoka.   
 Msanga ziwatsitsa kwakuya kwa bi.   

  **4.**   
 Nyengo yowapulumutsa itha,   
 Atifera posacedwea pano;   
 Kangaza mbale usacedwetse,   
 Ingoponya cingwe apulumuke.

title: 273 - Tsamira Pa Manja A Yesu
markdown:
### 273 - Tsamira Pa Manja A Yesu    
LEAN ON HIS ARMS   

  **1.**   
 Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, Akuthangate athagata;   
 Ukamkhulupira ndithu, Adzakusangalatsa. CHORUS (Sap. & Tenor):   
 Tsamiratu m’cikondi cace; Tsamiratu, yesa cifundo;   
 Tsamiratu, yang’ana m’Mwamba, Tsamira Mpulumutsi. (Bass & Alto):   
 Tsamiratu Iye, m’cikondi cace, Tsamira Iye, yesa cifuno;   
 Tsamiratu Iyel, yang’ana m’Mwamba, Tsamira Mpulumutsi.   

  **2.**   
 Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, ’Dzauza njira adzauza;   
 Ingotsala mokondwera, pomvera mau ace.   

  **3.**   
 Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, ’Dzakusamala, kusamala!   
 Katundu wolemeretsa Mpereke kwa Ambuye.   

  **4.**   
 Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, Msiyire zonse, zonsezodi!   
 Mtima wace ngwacikondi, Maso ace sasinza.

title: 274 - Ndiri Ndi Mbuye
markdown:
### 274 - Ndiri Ndi Mbuye   
I HAVE A SAVIOUR   

  **1.**   
 Ndiri ndi Mbuye wodandaulira,   
 Akonda Iyeyu kuposa dziko;   
 Pano andiyang’anira mwacifundo,   
 Ndifunatu akhale wa inunso! 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ndipempherera’nu, Ndipempherera’nu,   
 Ndipempherera’nu, Ndipempherera’nu,   

  **2.**   
 Ndiri ndi Tate andipatsa ine   
 Ciyembekezo ca moyo wosatha;   
 Sacedwa kuitana tipite kwathu;   
 Ndifuna adzalandire inunso!   

  **3.**   
 Ndiri n’zobvala, zopanda mabanga   
 Aindilindira mu ulemelero;   
 Wowalal monsemo konko ndizalandira,   
 Bwenzi ndifuna ukalandirenso!   

  **4.**   
 Pamene Yesu wakupeza iwe,   
 Tauzatu ena za mtendererewo   
 Mwini ndiye Kristu yemweyo apatsa,   
 Mtendere ndifuna mulandirenso!

title: 275 - Kosatha! N’kuti?
markdown:
### 275 - Kosatha! N’kuti?   
ETERNITY - WHERE   

  **1.**   
 "Kosatha! - n’kuyi?" Ndilo funsolo;   
 Konse komwe uli liri komweko!   
 Udzakhala kuti nthawi zosatha!   
 Udzakhala kuti nthawi zosatha!   

  **2.**   
 "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Kosatha n’kuti?   
 Ndi oomboledwa? Ndi otaika?   
 Mbali izi njiti - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"   
 Mbali izi njiti - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"   

  **3.**   
 "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Uchitiranji   
 Zokondwa za dziko mosaganiza?   
 Popanda kusankha - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"   
 Popanda kusankha - "Kosatha n’kuti?   

  **4.**   
 "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Bwenzi samala;   
 Adzaweruzatu Mulungu msanga   
 Lero linganene - "kosatha! N’kuti?"   
 Lero linganene - "Kosatha! N’kuti?   

  **5.**   
 "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Kosatha! N’kuti?"   
 Bwenzi usagone, lekana m’dziko,   
 Mpaka utayankha - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"   
 Mpaka utayankha - "Kosatha! N ’kuti.

title: 276 - M’khola Mwa Ng’ombe
markdown:
### 276 - M’khola Mwa Ng’ombe   
JESUS, MY SAVIOUR, TO BETHELEHEM CAME   

  **1.**   
 M’kola mwa ng’ombe mu Betlemumo, anabadwa ambuyangawo   
      Etu, ndidziwa, natsikirako, Kufuna inetu   
      Afuna inetu, afuna inetu.   
      Etu, ndizizwa, natsikirako, Afuna inetu.   

  **2.**   
 Popacikidwa pa Kalvarepo, Yesu anandiombolerako,   
 Inde, ndidziwa, nakondaneko, Nafera inetu.   
 Nafera inetu, Nafera inetu.   
 Inde ndizizwa nakondaneko, Nafera inetu.   

  **3.**   
 Mbusa wokoma ndi Mbuyangayo, Nandiitana posocerapo,   
 Konse koipa nalondaneko, Kubweza inetu   
 Abweza inetu, abweza inetu   
 Konse koipa nalondaneko, Abwenza inetu.   

  **4.**   
 Uko kumwamba, Mbuyangayo, Nandikonzera mokhaliramo,   
 Tsiku linalo adzabweranso, Kutenga inetu   
 Atenga inetu, atenga inetu.   
 Tsiku linalo adzabweranso, Kutenga inetu.

title: 281 - Nyenyezi Yabwino
markdown:
### 281 - Nyenyezi Yabwino

title: 282 - Mingoli Zikwi Khumi
markdown:
### 282 - Mingoli Zikwi Khumi   
TEN THOUSAND HARPS

 Aliluya! Aliluya! Aliluya! Amen   

  **2.**

  **3.**

title: 283 - Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi Ndine?
markdown:
### 283 - Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi Ndine?   
SHALL YOU? SHALL I?   

  **1.**   
 Wina adzalowa pakhomo, Msanga posacedwa,   
 Adzadya za ulemelero, Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi ndine?   
 Podzakondwerera kosatha; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi Ndine?   
 Wina adzayenda m’miseu, Nadzakhalandi masomphenya.   

  **2.**   
 Wina adzatula katundu, Msanga Posacedwa   
 Nadzalandiratu korona, Kodi ndiwe? Kondi ndine?   
 Wina adzaonatu Mfumu, Atamasuka ku zadziko,   
 Nadzakondwa naye k osatha; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?   

  **3.**   
 Wina ’dzagogoda citseko, Msanga Posacedwa   
 Nadzamvatu, Sindikudziwa, Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi ndine?   
 Poitana sadzamu yankha, Citseko citatsekedwatu,   
 Ndipo sadzalandira mphotho; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?   

  **4.**   
 Wina adzaimbatu nyimbo, Msanga posacedwa   
 Pamodzi ndi owomboledwa, Kodi ndiwe, kodi ndine?   
 Wina adzakakondwerera, Ndi okondedwa pa dookolo,   
 Ataomboledwa kosatha; kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?

  **3.**

title: 297 - Macimo Atsala Pa Mtanda
markdown:
### 297 - Macimo Atsala Pa Mtanda

  **2.**

  **3.**

title: 298 - Ndiribe Zanga, Zonse Nzanu
markdown:
### 298 - Ndiribe Zanga, Zonse Nzanu   
NONE OF SELF AND ALL OF THEE   

  **1.**   
 Ndinali nayotu nthawi Yowawa yacisoni,   
 Ndinauza Yesu "Zonse nzanga ndiribe zanu,"   
 Ine ndiribe canu Ine ndiribe canu,   
 Monyada ndinati "Zonse nzanga ndiribe canu."   

  **2.**   
 Nandipeza, ndinamwona pa mtanda wopwetekwa   
 Mtimabe unati, "zina n’zangatu zina n’zanu".   
 Zina n’zanga ndi zanu, Zina n’zanga ndi zanu,   
 Mtimabe unati "Zina n’zanga zina ndi zanu."   

  **3.**   
 Tsiku ndi tsiku cifundo cace cinanditsitsa,   
 Ndipo ndinati, "Ndicepe ndithu mukule Inu."   
 Ndicepe ine ndithu, mukule Inu Mbuye,   
 Ndipo ndinatu, "Ndicepe ndithu, mukule Inu."   

  **4.**   
 Cokwera kuposa myamba, Kuya kuposa Nyanja   
 Cikondi canu caposa Tiribe kanthu n’zanu   
 Ndiribe zanga, Ndiribe zanga n’zanu.   
 Cikondi canu coposa, "Tiribe kanthu n’zanu"

title: 301 - Ambuye Ali Pafupi Kudza
markdown:
