  **CHORUS:**   
 Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kucatu!   
 Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kuca ndithu!   
 Usiku wathadi! Usana wadzanso.   
 Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kucatu!   

  **2.**   
 Zizindikiro za mlengalenga Zilalikiradi;   
 Ndi za pa dziko zinena kuti Ambuye wayandikira   

  **3.**   
 Ndi nthawi yoti kunyada kuthu Mu mpingo wonsewo;   
 Ukhale wofulumira ntchito, Ukhale woyang’aniratu   

  **4.**   
 Pitani msanga kukalalika Kwa osaukawo;   
 Ndi kwa omveka a dziko lino; Onsewo afulumirenso.

title: 302 - Mulungu Wa Kumwamba
markdown:
### 302 - Mulungu Wa Kumwamba   
(Upon Dedicating a Church)   

  **1.**   
 Mulungu wa kumwamba, tabwera kunoku,   
 Ndi Mtima wokondwera kulowa m’nyumbayi   
 Cifukwa ca zabwino mwacitazi   
 Titokuyamikirani leroli. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Inde tikuyamikani, Atate, leroli,   
 Mwatimangira ’fe kuno kacisi wanuyu!   
 Ndi ulemerero wanu mudzadze m’mnyumbayi;   
 Muyeretse, mudalitse, munomu   

  **2.**   
 Tikondwa tonse kukuthokozani ’Nu   
 Poyamba kupemphera ndi kuyimbiramu   
 Mom’muno nsiku zonse mukhale nafetu   
 Monga nd angelo anu m’mwambamo.   

  **3.**   
 Ikhale ngati nyali, yowala m’nyumbayi,   
 Yakutsogoza onse opunthwa m’mdima bii,   
 Akunja ndi Akhristu mwapulumutse ndi kuunika koturuka munomu.

title: 303 - Kale Anthu M’kholamo
markdown:
### 303 - Kale Anthu M’kholamo   
WHO IS HE IN YONDER STALL?   

  **1.**   
 Kale anthu m’kholamo, Napembedza Mwanayo 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ndiye Mbuye, Mfuma yanga, Ndiye Mbuye, wakumwamba,   
 Amgwadire anthuwo, Timtamande Mfumuyo.   

  **2.**   
 Wosauka Iyedi, Anagwira ntchitozi.   

  **3.**   
 Ndani kodi munthuyo, Woyesedwa m’bwinjamo?  

  **4.**   
 Analira ndaniyo, Pomwalira bwenzilo?   

  **5.**   
 M’munda muna ndaniyo, Mwazi wace dotho do?   

  **6.**   
 Iye ndani m’ndamo, Anafera ’daniwo?   

  **7.**   
 Mkuca wace ndaniyo, Waturuka m’mandamo?   

  **8.**   
 Ndani alikudzako, Mponda wakuyeramo?

title: 304 - Atate Wa Kumwambako
markdown:
### 304 - Atate Wa Kumwambako   
FATHER, SON, AND SPIRIT   

  **1.**   
 Atate wa kumwambako, Munaombla ife ndi   
 Cikondi canu cijaco, Tiyamikira inutu.   

  **2.**   
 Ambuye Yesu ndinutu, Munabadwira anthu ’fe   
 Munatifera tonse fe, Tiyamikira Inutu   

  **3.**   
 Mzimu woyera m’timamo, Tiyeretsedwe ndinunso,   
 Munatisunga bwinoli, Tiyamikira Inutu.   

  **4.**   
 Atate, Mwana, Mzimunso, Ndinu atatu mmodzitu,   
 Ocimwa tinipemphhako, Mutikhululukire ’fe.

title: 305 - Dzuwa Lapita
markdown:
### 305 - Dzuwa Lapita   
THE SUN HAS SET   

  **1.**   
 Dzuwa lapita, Dzuwa lapita,   
 Mlungu mutigonetswe phe!   

  **2.**   
 Mdima wafika, mdima wafika,   
 Mutisunge tonse bwino.   

  **3.**   
 Tibvomereze, tibvomereze,   
 Zakucimwa zathu zonse.   

  **4.**   
 Mkhululukire, mkhululukire,   
 Zoipazi zathu zonse.   

  **5.**   
 Lero tigone lero tigone   
 Tigonemo mu mtendere   

  **6.**   
 Ndife ananu, Ndife ananu,   
 "Tate Mlungu wotikonda.

title: 306 - Yesu Adzaweruzatu
markdown:
### 306 - Yesu Adzaweruzatu   
BEFORE JEHOVA’S AWFUL THRONE   

  **1.**   
 Yesu adzaweruzatu Pomwe liwala dzuwapo   
 Wace ufumu ukhala Mpaka ku nthawi zonsezo   

  **2.**   
 Anthu m’mitundu yonseyo Adzayimbira dzinalo   
 Ndi ana onse ayimba, Hosana kwa Mulunguyo   

  **3.**   
 Kwa Iye apempheratu Kulemekeza Mbuyeyo   
 Ndi dzina lace likwera Mongatu nsembe mmwambamo  

  **4.**   
 Ndi anthu onse pansipo Alemekeze Mfumuyo,   
 Ndipo angelo ayimba, Ayankhe onsewo, Amen.

title: 307 - Munthu Wa Zisoniyo
markdown:
### 307 - Munthu Wa Zisoniyo   
MAN OF SORROWS   

  **1.**   
 Munthu wa zisoniyo, Timcha dzina lacelo,   
 Mpulumutsi dzinanso, Aleluya, Ndinu Yesu.   

  **2.**   
 Anapeputsidwako, Nandifera m’mtandamo   
 Anandiombolayo, Aleluya, ndinu Yesu.  

  **3.**   
 Anapacikidwatu, Natha nchito yace myu!   
 Anakwera mmwamba du! Aleluya, ndinu Yesu   

  **4.**   
 Adzabwera Iyenso, Kudzatenga acewo   
 Nyimbo tidzayimbanso, Aleluya, Ndinu Yesu.

title: 308 - Polenga Dzikoli
markdown:
### 308 - Polenga Dzikoli   
LET THERE BE LIGHT   

  **1.**   
 Polenga dzikoli, Pakumva Inudi, Kwayeratu;   
 Mumve pemperoli, Ndipo pamenepa, Palibe mauwo, Muwaletu.   

  **2.**   
 Inu wakudzatu Kuwaciritsadi A nthendawo;   
 Kupatsa moyowo, Kuona m’masomo, pa anthu onsewo, Muwaletu.   

  **3.**   
 Mzimu woonadi, Ndi wa cikondico, Idzanitu   
 Mwamba mulengemo, Pali za mdimazo, Pa dziko ponsepo, Muwaletu   

  **4.**   
 Inu Atatuwo, Wodala Mlunguyo, Timveretu,   
 Malengedwewo, Mdima ukhalamo, Mutume mauwo Muwaletu

title: 309 - Ndiyenda Naye Yesu Mbuye
markdown:
### 309 - Ndiyenda Naye Yesu Mbuye   
I’M WALKING EVERY DAY WITH JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndikondwa nthawi zonsezo   
 Ndipeza ciyanjano caceco, Ndikwanitsidwa ndi Iye. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ndiyende naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndifuna atsogoze ’ne   
 Pokagamira pa Mplumutsiyo Sinditaika konse bi   

  **2.**   
 Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndicite cifuniro ’ce.   
 Analonjeza kuthangata ’be, Adzakwanitsa zonsezo.   

  **3.**   
 Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndabvomereza chimolo,   
 Pamodzi tidzayenda konseko, Mu ciyanjano caceco.

title: 310 - Ndifuna Kukhala Ndi Yesu
markdown:
### 310 - Ndifuna Kukhala Ndi Yesu   
I WANT TO LIVE CLOSER TO JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Ndifuna kukhala ndi Yesu, Kuyang’ana nkhope yace,

  **CHORUS:**

 Kuyang’ana pa nkhope yabwinoyo, Ndifuna kukhala naye.   

  **2.**   
 Ndifuna kukhala ndi Yesu, Kumtsata pafupifupi   
 Ndi kuti ndimvetse polankhula ’Ye, ponena lonjezo lace.   

  **3.**   
 Ndifuna kukhala ndi Yesu, Pafupi masiku onse   
 Pogwiratu dzanja la mphamvu yace, Nkalowa m’ufumu wace.

title: 311 - E, Mzimuu Wa Mulungu ’Nu
markdown:
### 311 - E, Mzimuu Wa Mulungu ’Nu   
O SPIRIT OF THE LIVING GOD   

  **1.**   
 E, Mzimu wa Mulungu, ’Nu, Mukhale m’mtimanga;   
 Ndi zangazo ndipatsatu Kwa Inu, Mbuyanga 

  **CHORUS:**

 Mdzaze, mdzaze ’ne, Wanu ndikhaletu.   

  **2.**   
 Ndifunatu kucitadi Kufuna kwanuko;   
 Sin’funa kanthu kena bi, Mndidzaze, mtimamo,   

  **3.**   
 Ndilibe kanthu kabwino, Kopatsa Inuyo;   
 Mutsuke Mtima wangawo, Ndi mwazi wanuwo.

title: 312 - Taitanidwa Kubatizidwa
markdown:
### 312 - Taitanidwa Kubatizidwa   
CALLED TO BE BAPTIZED   

  **1.**   
 Tainanidwatu, Kuli mtsinje Yordano;   
 Ife tinamvadi Mau mcipululumo 

  **CHORUS:**

 Kuti titsukidwa Mphululupulu zathuzo.   

  **2.**   
 Tamva Uthangawo, Wa cikondi caceco   
 Lapani m’mtimamo, Yesu ali kudzanso   

  **3.**   
 Yesu anenanso, Yemwe akhulupira,   
 Nabatizidwa ’ye, Adzapulumukadi.   

  **4.**   
 Tiyamikiratu Nsisi zace Yesuyo;   
 Watiturusadi Mdima wa zoipazo.

title: 313 - Pa Ubatizo
314 - Anyamata Inu
markdown:
### 314 - Anyamata Inu   
WHAT CAN THE YOUTH DO?   

  **1.**   
 Anyamata inutu, Atsikana inunso,   
 Muti, Tingavcitenji, Ang’ono ndifetu,   
 Kuthandiza ufumu Wa Yesu?   

  **2.**   
 Aphunzitse anthuwo, Awalalikiredi,   
 Akukhala moipa Mu mdima wakunja,   
 Alowetu m’ufumu Wa Yesu.   

  **3.**   
 E! ang’ono ndifetu, Nzeru sizimafika,   
 Kuti tingaphunzitse, Titani tonse ’fe   
 Kuthandiza ufumu wa Yesu?   

  **4.**   
 Inu nonse, anzanga, Tingoganiza bwino,   
 Tinganene mofatsa, Timverenso, Mbuye,   
 Kuthandiza ufumu Wa Yesu.   

  **5.**   
 Pothandiza amathu, Pakwakonda anzathu,   
 Pakusiya zoipa, Pkhaladi bwino,   
 Tithandiza ufumu Wa Yesu.

title: 315 - Mmene Ine Ndiri Mwana
markdown:
### 315 - Mmene Ine Ndiri Mwana   
I WILL EARLY SEEK THE SAVIOUR   

  **1.**   
 Mmene ine ndiri mwana Ndzaphunzira zacezo;

  **CHORUS:**

  **2.**

  **3.**

title: 316 - Tiri Otumika
markdown:
### 316 - Tiri Otumika   
MISSIONARY VOLUNTEERS   

  **1.**

  **CHORUS:**

  **2.**   
 Anyamata onsewo, atsikananso,

  **3.**

  **4.**   
 Mpaka Yesu adzanso, tidzagwirabe

title: 317 - Anakwatira Kale
markdown:
### 317 - Anakwatira Kale   
THE VOICE THAT BREATHED O’ER EDEN   

  **1.**   
 Anakwatira kale Pa Eden pajapo;   
 Ulipo lero lino, Mdalitso womwewo   

  **2.**   
 Awiri aimamu, Mwamma ndi mkaziyu,   
 O! Mzimu wakuyera Mdalitso mpatsetu.   

  **3.**   
 Mulunzanitse awa, Atate leroli;   
 Munakwatits’ Adamu ndi Hava kalelo.   

  **4.**   
 Mukhale nawo Yesu Mongatukaleko,   
 Ukwati mnadalitsa Pa Kana pajapo.   

  **5.**   
 Mwasunge, mwayendetse Mu njira yanuyo,   
 Akhale ndi kudala Pa banja pawopo.

title: 318 - Tsiku La Sabata
markdown:
### 318 - Tsiku La Sabata   
HOLY SABBATH DAY   

  **1.**   
 Tsiku la Sabatalo, Mlungu nalipatula;

  **CHORUS:**

  **2.**

  **3.**

  **4.**   
 Tipemphere nsisizo, Ndi gonjetso lacelo,

title: 319 - Ndidzayimba Za Mulungu
markdown:
### 319 - Ndidzayimba Za Mulungu   
I WILL SING   

  **1.**

  **CHORUS:**

 Angelo omwe, Akukala m’mwambamo, E, M’mwambamo   

  **2.**   
 Ndinacita mphulupulu, Waiwala zonsezo,   
 Ndinakhala ndi zoipa, Wazicotsa zonsezo   

  **3.**   
 Wandipatsa moyo wace, Moyo wakuyera mbu,   
 Ine ndiri mwana wace, Wandilera inetu.   

  **4.**   
 Ndiyamika Mbuye wanga, Ndidzamlemekezatu,   
 Ndipititsa mbiri yace, Ya kukonda kwaceku.

title: 320 - Yesu Wathu Mbuyeyo
markdown:
### 320 - Yesu Wathu Mbuyeyo   
SINNERS JESUS WILL RECEIVE   

  **1.**   
 Yesu wathu Mbuyeyo alandira onsewo

  **CHORUS:**

 Yesu Ambuye, indetu, sakanatu, sakanatu;   
 Mvetsa, mvetsadi, E, wabwinowo, Wakucimwa adzetu,   

  **2.**   
 Idzatu kwa YEsu, apumitsa inunso,   
 Inde m’tima mwanumo ndi mtendere wacewo.   

  **3.**   
 Walandira inetu tsiku lija kalelo,   
 Wanditsuka ine mbu m’mtima mwanga momwemo.   

  **4.**   
 Wandifera Yesuyo pansi pano kalelo,   
 Sindiopa mlanduwo pakubwera Iyeyo.

title: 321 - Mvamva Mau A Mulungu
markdown:
### 321 - Mvamva Mau A Mulungu   
COME  BELIEVING   

  **1.**   
 Mwamva mau a Mulungu, Mukabvomeranjiko?   
 Kodi musanduka Mtima, Ndikumvera Yesuyo? 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Bvomerani, bvomerani, Bvomerani msangatu (etu)   
 Musacedweranso ai, Landirani Yesuyo.   

  **2.**   
 Munacita nthantha kale, Musacedweransobi;   
 Yesu ali kulindira, Inu sadzakanai.   

  **3.**   
 Musaope kaamba zinthu Zakuipa zanuzo;   
 Mukakhulupira Yesu, Akacotsa zonsezo.   

  **4.**   
 Pelekeni Mtima wanu, Kwa Mulungu wathuyo,

title: 322 - Mau Ngonyozekatu
markdown:
### 322 - Mau Ngonyozekatu   
WORDS ARE THINGS OF LITTLE COST   

  **1.**

  **2.**   
 Ife timalankhula, Mosaganiziratu,   
 Mau akunyadawo, Ndi obisa chimolo,   
 Mau akukwiyanso, Ndi onena enawao.   

  **3.**   
 Mbuye tipatsenife, Mphamvu yodikirayo,   
 Mtisogoze, Mbuye’Nu, Tisacimwe m’mauwo,   
 Mmwamba tidzaimbetu, Nyimbo zoyamika’Nu

title: 323 - Mbuye Ndapangana
markdown:
### 323 - Mbuye Ndapangana   
LEAVING HEATHEN CUSTOMS   

  **1.**   
 Mbuye ndapangana M’njira yanuyi,   
 Kuti ndidzayenda Osalekai,   
 Mundipatse Mtima Wopiriramo   
 Wakukana zonse zondipingazo.   

  **2.**   
 Mzimu wakuipa Undiyesa ’ne   
 Mundithangatire Kuthawitsabe   
 Akandisautsa Kumudzi kunoku   
 Mulowetse mphamvu M’mtima mwangamu   

  **3.**   
 Akathira nsembe Ku mizimuyo,   
 Ndipenyere kwanu Ee, Kumwambako,   
 Tsoka ndi zonyenga Za ufitizo   
 Yesu, mndilimbitse, Ndisaopezo.   

  **4.**   
 Pena kumwa nao, Ndisateroko,   
 Pena kukaona Za kubvinazo,   
 Pena kuombeza Sindifunai;   
 Yesu mndithandize Kuzikanazi.   

  **5.**   
 Ndinu Mbusa wanga, Mndithandizetu,   
 Ndisaipse nazo Mtima wangawu.   
 Osaopa konse, osacimwa bi,   
 Mndiyendetse Yesu M’njira yanuyi.

title: 324 - T’yimbe Nyimbo Yotikondwetsa
markdown:
### 324 - T’yimbe Nyimbo Yotikondwetsa

  **1.**   
 T’yimbe nyimbo yotikondwetsa m’njiramo,

  **CHORUS:**

  **3.**   
 Tidzagwira ntchito imene tipeza   
 Tidzafika kwathu kwathu msangatu   
 Adzatilimbitsa mwa nsisi zacezo   
 Posacedwa tidzafikako.   

  **4.**   
 Tidzakonza njira kwa anthu otopa,   
 Tidzafika kwathu msangatu   
 Tidzakopa anthu m’cikondi caceco   
 Posacedwa tidzafikako   

  **5.**   
 Tidzapumuladi pa tsidya la myanja   
 Tidzafika kwathu msangatu   
 Anthu sadzalira mu mzinda wowala   
 Posacedwa tidzafikako.

title: 325 - Pakupempha Ife Pano
markdown:
### 325 - Pakupempha Ife Pano

 Pakupempha ife pano, pakwitana "Tateyo,

  **CHORUS:**

  **2.**

  **3.**

  **4.**   
 Bvumbulutsa zonse zako zobisika m’mtimamo,

title: 326 - Mpingo Wa Akristu ’Fe
markdown:
### 326 - Mpingo Wa Akristu ’Fe   
WE’RE A LITTLE CHRISTIAN BAND   

  **1.**

  **CHORUS:**

  **2.**

  **3.**   
 Msanga tidzapumadi, tikondwera mwa Ambuye   
 Tidzabvala kronayo, tikondwra mwa Ambuye.

title: 327 - Alikuitana Uko Tsidyalo
markdown:
### 327 - Alikuitana Uko Tsidyalo   
THERE’S A CALL COMES RINGING   

  **1.**

 Tibukitse mau acewo, Ndi mitima yonseyo   
 Pakumlemekeza Mlunguyo, Ndi kusunga mwauwo,   
 Tuma mau a uthengawo, Kuli konse amvetu,   
 Tuma mau a uthengawo, Osaleka konse bi. (Tibukitse mau acewo, Ndi mitima yakufunatu,   
 Pakumlemekeza Mlunguyo, Ndi kusunga mau acewo   
 Tuma mau a uthengawo, Kuli konse amvetu,   
 Tuma mau a uthengawo, Osaleka konse bi.   

  **2.**   
 Tamva kuitana tsidya lijalo, Tumiza mauwo,   
 Tipereke za cifundo zathuzo, Tumiza mauwo.   

  **3.**   
 Tipempheretu cisomo caceco, Tumiza mauwo,   
 Mzimu wa Ambuye anke ponsepo, Tumiza mauwo.   

  **4.**   
 Tisaleme pakucita zabwino, Tumiza mauwo,   
 Pakukopa anthu osocerawo, Tumiza mauwo.

title: 328 - NATIONAL ATHEM (Chichewa)
markdown:
### 328 - NATIONAL ATHEM (Chichewa)   

  **1.**   
 Mlungu dalitsani Malawi,   
    Mumsunge m’mtendere,   
    Khonjetsani adani onse,   
    Njala nthenda nsanje,   
    Lunzitsani mitima yathu,   
    Kuti tisaope,   
    Mdalitse mtsogoleri nafe,   
    Ndi Mayi Malawi,    

  **2.**   
 Malawi dziko lokongola,   
Lachonde ndi ufulu,   
Nyanja ndi mphepo ya m’mapiri,   
Ndithudi tadala,   
Zigwa, mapiri, nthaka, Dzinthu   
Mphatso zaulere   
Nkhalango, madambo abwino   
Ngokoma Malawi.

  **3.**   
 O’ Ufulu tigwirizane,   
Kukweza Malawi   
Ndi chikondi, khama kumvera,   
Timutumikire   
Pa nkhondo nkana pa mtendere   
Cholinga n’chimodzi   
Mayi, Bambo, tidzipereke   
Pokweza Malawi

title: 329 - Ndikonda Kuti Atate
markdown:
### 329 - Ndikonda Kuti Atate   
I AM SO GLAD THAT OUR FATHER   

  **1.**   
 Ndikondwa kuti Atate wathu, Atidziwitsa cikondi cace,   
 Pakuwerenga m’kalata mwace, Yesu, amati akonda ine. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Ndikondwerera kuti YEsu Akonda ’ne, akonda ’ne.   
 Ndikondwerera kuti Yesu Akonda inenso.   

  **2.**   
 Nkana ndingamuiwale Iye, Ndikusocera kutaritari,   
 Andikondabe masiku onse Ndikabwereranso kwa Iyeyo   

  **3.**   
 Pakudzamona Ambuyangayo M’ulemerero wa kumwambako   
 Ndzayimba kosalekeza konse, Ndikondwa Yesu akonda ine.

title: 330 - Lemekeza Mlungu Tate
markdown:
### 330 - Lemekeza Mlungu Tate   
GROLY BE TO GOD THE FATHER   

  **1.**   
 Lemekeza Mlungu ’tate, Lemekeza Mwananso,   
 Lemekeza, Mlungu Mzimu, Mlungu Mmodzi mkuruyo;   
 Lemekeza, lemekeza, Mlungu wathu yemweyo.   

  **2.**   
 Mlemekeze, anaconda, Natisuka m’mtimamo,   
 Anatiombola ife, Tikhale nayeyo;   
 Lemekeza, lemekeza, Yesu Mbuye nsembeyo.   

  **3.**   
 Lemekeza Mfumu yathu, Mfumu, Mlengi wathuyo,   
 Apambana anthu onse, Pansi ndi kumwambako;   
 Lemekeza, lemekeza, Mfumu ya mafumuyo.

title: 331 - Tamani Mlungu Mtimamo
markdown:
### 331 - Tamani Mlungu Mtimamo   
PRAISE THE LORD, O MY SOUL   

  **1.**   
 Tamani Mlungu mtimamo, Wakundifera pansipo,   
 Nafafaniza chimolo, Nanditengera dipole. 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Wandiombola inetu, Potaya mwazi wacewo   
 Timlemekeza Iyetu, Wotipilira dipole   

  **2.**   
 Ndinasocera kalelo, Ndamkana Iye Yesuyo   
 Koma ndiyimba leroli, Wandiombola inedi.   

  **3.**   
 Cikondwerero ciripo, Popenyetsetsa Yesuyo,   
 Pa mtanda pace pomwepo, Pakundifera inenso.   

  **4.**   
  Ndiribe ntchito zangazo, Kukoma Mtima wangawo   
 Anandiyesa inetu, Wakulungama Yesuyo.   

  **5.**   
 Tsono mubwere inunso, Mombolo wanu ndiyedi   
 Apulumutsa onsewo, Okhulupira Yesuyo.

title: 332 - Pakukhala Pa Mgonero
markdown:
### 332 - Pakukhala Pa Mgonero   
WHILE IN SWEET COMMUNION   

  **1.**   
 Pakukhala pa mgonero, Wa Ambuye wathuyo,   
 Tionetu mwazi wanu, Muja unakheramu   
 Nkana singaone Inu, Muli mfupi nafedi,   
 Mutsangalatse, Mbuye    

  **2.**   
 Mutiuze ife nthano Ya mabvuto anuwo,   
 Pakuyembekeza Inu, Tisendeza kwanuko   
 Mtikokere mfupi ndi ’Nu, Ndi ku mtanda wanuwo,   
 Mpaka tidzaone tokha, Monga munaona ’fe.   

  **3.**   
 Pakucoka pa mgonero, Wa Ambuye wathuyo,   
 Moyo wathu ufanane, Ndi wa Mbuye wathuyo,   
 Pakutsanza moyo wace, Tisanduka Iyeyo.   
 Timuchula wathu, Pakumvera mau ’ce.

title: 333 - Tikagwidwa Ndi Cisoni
markdown:
### 333 - Tikagwidwa Ndi Cisoni   
WE ARE SORROWFUL   

  **1.**   
 Tikagwidwa ndi cisoni, Ikayendanso misozi,   
 Poliriratu abale, Yesu mutimveretu.   

  **2.**   
 Munabvala thupi lathu, Munadziwa masauko   
 Mnalirira bwenzi lanu, Yesu mutimveretu.   

  **3.**   
 Mmene imfa yathu idza, Mwenya wathu ukaleka   
 Mmene ife timwalira, Yesu mutiveretu.   

  **4.**   
 Mnamwalira Inu paja, Mwazi wanu munataya,   
 Inu munagona m’manda, Yesu mutimveretu.

title: 334 - Mmene Ine Ndisauka
markdown:
### 334 - Mmene Ine Ndisauka   
WHEN THE STORMS OF LIFE   

  **1.**   
 Mnene ine ndisauka Ndi zoipa zangazo   
 Ndidzapita kwa Mulungu, Adzandilandiratu 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Mlungu adzalandira, Iye ndiye Atate wanga,   
 Watumiza Mwana wace, Anandifera kalelo.   

  **2.**   
 Ngati atsamwali anga sandikonda ine bi.   
 Ndikhulupirire Mlungu, Iye sandikanai.   

  **3.**   
 Pansi pano ndiri mlendo, Kwathu ndi kumwambako,   
 Mmene adzabwera Yesu Ndidzapita komweko.

title: 335 - Pofunafuna M’malembo Ace
markdown:
### 335 - Pofunafuna M’malembo Ace   
SEARCHING THE SCRIPTURES   

  **1.**   
 Pofunafuna m’malembo ace, Pofuna Mpulumutsiyo,   
 Momwe tikumva za Ambuye, Bible amati c’ani ko? 

  **CHORUS:**   
 Pita, kafunse, ati Mfumu, Ka’mba ka iwe, ndinetu   
 Pita, gogoda khomo lace, Komwe udzapumulako.   

  **2.**   
 Pofunafuna m’malembo ace, Tiri kufuna njirayo   
 Yonka ku mzinda wopambana, Bible amati c’ani ko?   

  **3.**   
 Pofunafuna m’malembo ace, Pofuna otaikawo,   
 Kuwatsogoza kwa Ambuye, Bible amati c’ani ko?

title: 336 - Usikuwo Woyerawo
markdown:
### 336 - Usikuwo Woyerawo   
SILENT NIGHT   

  **1.**   
 Usikuwo woyerawo, Mwana adamlerayo,   
 Akakhale Mfumuyo, Anabadwa m’kholamo   
 Mfumu ya Mafumu, Ndi ya anthuwo.   

  **2.**   
 Mwanayo wa Mulunguyo, Andikonda inetu,   
 Nantayira cumaco, Nadzagona M’udzumo,   
 Ndiyamika Mbuye Wanga Yesuyo   

  **3.**   
 Usikuwo woyerawo, Nudzatu Mtenderewo,   
 Ife tonse anthuwo, Atitenga Mlunguyo;   
 Mlemekeze "Tate, Mwana, Mzimunso.

title: 337 - Pamene Ndizaukanso
markdown:
### 337 - Pamene Ndizaukanso   
WHEN I SHALL AWAKE   

  **1.**   
 Pamene ndidzaukanso tsikulo, Komwe kulibe mdima konse bi.   
 Ee! Ulemerero ’dzawaliramo, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu. CHORUS: Ndidzakwanitsidwatu, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu   
 Pamene ndidzaukanso tsikulo, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu.   

  **2.**   
 Pamene ndidzamuona Iyeyo, Nandilandira mokondweratu,   
 Pakumva cisomo ca Ambuyeyo, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu.   
   

  **3.**   
 Poklomana nawo okondedwawo Omwe mwa imfa nandisiya ’ne,   
 Pomwepo ineyo ndidzamtama ’Ye, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu.   
   

  **4.**   
 Ndidzamuona Yesu posacedwatu, Iye amene nandifera ’ne    
 Ndidzamuyimbira kosalekadi, Ndidzakwanitsidwatu

title: 338 - Utsegule Pa Khomo
markdown:
### 338 - Utsegule Pa Khomo   
YOU MUST OPEN THE DOOR   

  **1.**   
 Utsegule pa khomo, kuti Yesu alowe;   
 Ndi ngati ulola ’dzacotsa chimo   
 Tsegula mtimawo

title: 339 - Mpatse Yesuu Mtima Wako
markdown:
### 339 - Mpatse Yesuu Mtima Wako   
GIVE YOUR HEART TO JESUS   

  **1.**   
 Mpatse Yesu Mtima wako wonsewo,   
 Alikuitana iwe Mbuyeyo   
 Mpatse Yesu Mtima wako leroli;   
 Mpatsetu mtimawo.

title: 340 - Taya Zobvuta Zako
markdown:
### 340 - Taya Zobvuta Zako   
ROLL YOUR BURDENS AWAY   

    Taya zobvuta zako, Taya zobvuta zako   
 Ambuye adzacotsa zonsezo, Taya zobvuta zako.

title: 341 - Mdzaze ’Ne Ndi Mzimu
markdown:
### 341 - Mdzaze ’Ne Ndi Mzimu   
WITH THY SPIRIT FILL ME   

 Mdzadze ’ne ndi Mzimu, Mzimu wanu, Mbuye.   
 Mundipange wanuyo, Mdzaze ’ne ndi Mzimu.

title: 342 - Mbuye, Mumvetu Pempho Lathu
markdown:
### 342 - Mbuye, Mumvetu Pempho Lathu   
HEAR OUR PRAYER, O LORD    

 Mbuye, mumvetu Pempho lathulo,   
 Mtipatse tonsefe Mtendere wanu. Amen

title: 343 - Mticitire Cifundo
markdown:
### 343 - Mticitire Cifundo   
LORD, HAVE MERCY    

 Mticitire cifuno, Ambuye,   
 Mtithandize kusunga lamulo. Amen

title: 344 - Usiku Unowu
markdown:
### 344 - Usiku Unowu   
LORD, KEEP US SAFE THIS NIGHT   

 Usiku unowu, Mtisunge Mbuyathu,   
 Angelo asamale ’fe, Kufikira mawa. Amen.

title: 345 - Mmene Tipita Kwathu
markdown:
### 345 - Mmene Tipita Kwathu   
DISMISS US, LORD, WITH BLESSING    

 Mmene tipita kwathu, Mbuye, Mutidalitse m’njira zathu;   
 Mtisogolere tsiku lonse, Kuti tilowe kumwambako.

title: 346 - Ambuye Ali M’nyumba Yace
markdown:
### 346 - Ambuye Ali M’nyumba Yace   
THE LORD IS IN HIS HOLY TEMPLE    

 Ambuye ali m’nyumba yace, M’kacisi wace wakuyera,   
 Akhale cete onse, Akhale cete pa maso pace.   
 Akhale mwa cete, mu nyumbayi. Amen.

title: 347 - Patseni Wina Mbuyanga
markdown:
### 347 - Patseni Wina Mbuyanga    
LORD, LAY SOME SOUL UPON MY HEART    

 Patseni wina, Mbuyanga, Yosowa Inuyo    
 Ndicite mbali yangatu, Kumkopa iyeyo.    
 Kumkopa iyeyo; Kumkopa iyeyo;    
 Ndicite mbali yangatu, Kumkopa iyeyo.

title: 348 - Yang’anani Kwa Yesu
markdown:
### 348 - Yang’anani Kwa Yesu    
TURN YOUR EYES UPON JESUS   

 Yang’anani Yesu, Ee! Yang’anitsitsani ’Ye!   
 Ndipo za pa dziko zizimadi, Pakuona kuwala kwace.

title: 349 - Mu Mtimanga
markdown:
### 349 - Mu Mtimanga    
INTO MY HEART    

Mu mtimanga, mu mtimanga, Lowani, Ambuye Yesu    
Lowanitu, mukhalemo, Lowani, Ambuye Yesu.

title: 350 - Mutitsitsimutse
markdown:
### 350 - Mutitsitsimutse    
LORD, SEND A REVIVAL    

 Mutitsitsimutse, Ambuyathu Yesu,   
Mutitsitsimutse, Muyambire inetu.
